original: pha dang / ma'am /
analyzed: pha dang / ma'am /
translated: parents,

original: dge 'dun dkon mchog gam /🔽sangs rgyas @251a *//
analyzed: dge 'dun dkon mchog gam / sangs rgyas @251a *//
translated: the jewel of the Saṅgha,🔽all the buddhas,

original: thams cad kyi bstan pa'am /
analyzed: thams cad kyi bstan pa'am /
translated: the teachings of all the buddhas,

original: sbyin pa'i gnas kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i gnas kyi gang zag sna tshogs sam /
translated: various people who are worthy of offerings,

original: slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / byang chub kyi theg pa grub pa'am /
analyzed: slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / byang chub kyi theg pa grub pa'am /
translated: masters, gurus, and those who have accomplished the vehicle of awakening,

original: de la zhugs pa dag gam /
analyzed: de la zhugs pa dag gam /
translated: or those who have entered it,

original: phongs pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dang len pa dag la 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin par byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste; sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi g-yogs pa rab tu thob ste dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par yog par gyur cig /
analyzed: phongs pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dang len pa dag la 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin par byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste; sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi g-yogs pa rab tu thob ste dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par yog par gyur cig /
translated: and to those who are in need, the poor, the beggars, and those who receive gifts, and when they give, offer, and make gifts, they dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way: ‘May all sentient beings obtain the covering of all the buddhas and be filled with roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'das te yon tan dang ye shes kyis mngon par bkab par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su 'das te yon tan dang ye shes kyis mngon par bkab par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings transcend all afflictions and subsidiary afflictions and be covered with qualities and wisdom.’

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sdus dang / mun pa dang / yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te lus shin tu bkab par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sdus dang / mun pa dang / yongs su gdung ba thams cad las rnam par 'das te lus shin tu bkab par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be completely covered by the bodies of all beings, and may they transcend all the miseries, darkness, and torments of the world.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug cing sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po can du gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta na sdug cing sangs rgyas thams cad la mnga' ba'i ye shes kyi snying po can du gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have bodies that are pleasing to behold for all beings and that are the essence of the wisdom of all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la log pa med par 'jug par brtson pas ma 'khrugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu bkab par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la log pa med par 'jug par brtson pas ma 'khrugs pa'i chos dkar pos shin tu bkab par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be completely covered by the unperturbed pure qualities of their engagement in the unerring Dharma of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mthar gtugs te mngon par bkab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi lus kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mthar gtugs te mngon par bkab pa'i lus dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have bodies that are completely covered by the bodies of the Dharma, and may they reach the end of the bodies of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten @251b kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob pa'i gdugs su red par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten @251b kun la stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi bla res skyob pa'i gdugs su red par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be canopies that protect the world with the wisdom of the ten powers.

original: sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad las shin tu 'phags shing chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas ye shes kyis rnam par snang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad las shin tu 'phags shing chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi snying po dang ldan pas ye shes kyis rnam par snang bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be illuminated by wisdom, having the essence of exalted, non-attached wisdom, exalted above all three realms.

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la bsod nams thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdugs su 'os par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas dam pa la bsod nams thams cad kyis mchod pa'i phyir gdugs su 'os par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be worthy of honor, worthy of being honored with all merits, as the highest field of merit.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi dam par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi gdugs rnam par sangs rgyas pas gdugs kyi dam par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be the highest of canopies, with the canopy of unexcelled wisdom fully opened.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi chos la dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par bzung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi chos la dbang ba'i gdugs yang dag par bzung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: When the bodhisattva mahasattva gives canopies, he dedicates the roots of goodness in this way: ‘May all sentient beings attain the canopy of mastery of the Dharma.’

original: gdugs gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: gdugs gcig gis nam mkha' thams cad kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: With a single canopy, may they cover the entire realm of space.

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par bstan pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all the miracles of all the Buddhas in all the world systems in the cosmos may be revealed without interruption.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs gcig gis brgyan te de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad gdugs gcig gis brgyan te de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all the realms of the cosmos may be adorned with a single parasol and offered to the Tathagatas.

original: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan yid du 'ong pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus pa gdugs @252a *//
analyzed: gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan yid du 'ong pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus pa gdugs @252a *//
translated: I dedicate so that all the Tathagatas may be covered with beautiful parasols, banners, and flags.

original: kyi rgyan gyis kun tu yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: kyi rgyan gyis kun tu yog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all the Buddha-fields without exception may be filled with the adornments of parasols.

original: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang / 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad gdugs thams cad kyis dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan la mos pa'i sems can thams cad dang / 'gro ba'i tshogs thams cad gdugs thams cad kyis dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings who are devoted to the names of the Buddhas, and all the hosts of beings, may be covered with all parasols.

original: rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas sangs rgyas gcig la phul bas sangs rgyas thams cad la brjod du med pa'i gdugs phul bar sems shing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi gdugs sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas sangs rgyas gcig la phul bas sangs rgyas thams cad la brjod du med pa'i gdugs phul bar sems shing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that by offering an inexpressible, inexpressibly numerous variety of all precious parasols to one Buddha, I may have offered an inexpressible number of parasols to all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par byang chub pas 'phags pa'i gdugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub mngon par byang chub pas 'phags pa'i gdugs kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that by the enlightenment of all the Buddhas, the noble parasol may cover all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku ji snyed 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: I dedicate so that all the bodies of the Buddhas, as many as there are in all the world systems of the ten directions, throughout space and throughout the realm of phenomena, may be covered with parasols.

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na bzhugs pa thams cad la gdugs kyis dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad na bzhugs pa thams cad la gdugs kyis dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all the Buddhas may be covered with parasols.

original: nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba brgyus shing klubs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi mchog gi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa'i gdugs dang /🔽rgyan mdzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan tshad med par yangs shing rgya che ba dang / gser gyi dra bas kun nas yog par brgyan pa /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i gdugs dang / rin po che thams cad kyi phreng ba brgyus shing klubs pa dang / spos thams cad kyi mchog gi dri zhim po'i ngad 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnam par spras pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan mdzes shing rnam par dag pa'i gdugs dang / rgyan tshad med par yangs shing rgya che ba dang / gser gyi dra bas kun nas yog par brgyan pa /
translated: parasols adorned with all precious jewels, parasols draped with strings of all precious jewels, parasols with the sweet scent of the finest of all incenses, parasols inlaid with various precious materials,🔽parasols with beautiful, pure adornments, parasols with adornments of limitless vastness, parasols adorned with nets of gold,

original: dril bu'i dra ba kun nas dbyangs pa'i sgra yid du 'ong @252b zhing snyan pa 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / ye shes bsgribs pa med cing chags pa med pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par dga' ba'i gdugs yongs su gtang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dril bu'i dra ba kun nas dbyangs pa'i sgra yid du 'ong @252b zhing snyan pa 'byung ba'i gdugs dang / ye shes bsgribs pa med cing chags pa med pa'i gdugs dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mngon par dga' ba'i gdugs yongs su gtang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: parasols with the sound of pleasant, melodious bells, parasols of unobstructed, unattached wisdom, and parasols of delight in all buddhas.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la ye shes mchog gi gdugs kyis mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva dedicates those roots of goodness from the gift of parasols to all sentient beings, in order to cover them with the supreme parasol of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis kun nas g-yogs shing rab tu brgyan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan gyis kun nas g-yogs shing rab tu brgyan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the merit] in order to completely cover and adorn them with the qualities of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / yon tan dang / dgongs pa dam pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / yon tan dang / dgongs pa dam pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the merit] in order to purify the sublime wisdom, qualities, and intentions of the buddhas.

original: sems rin po che mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems rin po che mtha' yas pa la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the merit] in order to attain mastery over the infinite precious mind.

original: chos thams cad la ye shes kyi dbang bsgyur ba kun tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la ye shes kyi dbang bsgyur ba kun tu rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the merit] in order to completely perfect mastery over all phenomena with wisdom.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par g-yogs par yongs su bsngo ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis mngon par g-yogs par yongs su bsngo ba'i don du yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all roots of virtue may be completely covered.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi gdugs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may attain the supreme parasol of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcus bla re bres pa'i gdugs su 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs bcus bla re bres pa'i gdugs su 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the ten powers of all buddhas may become the parasol of the canopy.

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis g-yogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gis g-yogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the entire realm of phenomena may be covered by a single buddha realm.

original: chos thams cad la dbang @253a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad la dbang @253a *//
translated: I dedicate so that all phenomena may be mastered.

original: phyug tu dbang sgyur ba'i dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //🔽mthu chen po dang / dbang chen po'i sems kyi rgyud thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: phyug tu dbang sgyur ba'i dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // mthu chen po dang / dbang chen po'i sems kyi rgyud thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the power of mastery may be attained.🔽I dedicate so that the mind may attain great power and great mastery.

original: blo yangs pa dang sems rgya che ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blo yangs pa dang sems rgya che ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the mind may attain vast intelligence and great scope.

original: yon tan tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: yon tan tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may be completely covered with immeasurable good qualities.

original: yon tan thams cad kyis sems mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: yon tan thams cad kyis sems mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may be filled with joy by all good qualities.

original: sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis 'gro ba thams cad mngon par dgab pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may be completely covered by all beings.

original: ye shes chen pos mnyam par dgab pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ye shes chen pos mnyam par dgab pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may attain the covering of equality through great wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsngo ba'i tshul ma lus par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //🔽sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsngo ba'i tshul ma lus par thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may attain the complete way of dedicating.🔽I dedicate so that all beings may have pure thoughts and intentions.

original: bsam pa dge ba dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bsam pa dge ba dang / yid kyi dbang po rnam par dag pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may have virtuous intentions and pure mental faculties.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dgab cing yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba chen pos mngon par dgab cing yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all beings may be covered with the great dedication and be completely gathered.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i yu ba can rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i yu ba can rin po che'i dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba /
translated: “In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Dhvajāgrakeyūraraśmi, together with a retinue of many hundreds of thousands of bodhisattvas, with various kinds of precious banners and flags with precious jeweled tassels, with the sound of the pleasant ringing of precious bells,

original: snam bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dbyangs pa /
analyzed: snam bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dbyangs pa /
translated: with various kinds of precious cloths,

original: kha dog dang tshon sna tshogs @253b kyi snam bus brgyan cing bsgrengs pa /
analyzed: kha dog dang tshon sna tshogs @253b kyi snam bus brgyan cing bsgrengs pa /
translated: with banners and flags adorned with various colors and dyes,

original: gser gyi dra bas kun nas dbyangs shing klubs pa /
analyzed: gser gyi dra bas kun nas dbyangs shing klubs pa /
translated: covered with a golden latticework,

original: gser gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba /
analyzed: gser gyi dril bu'i sgra 'byung ba /
translated: with the sound of golden bells,

original: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas shin tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa /
analyzed: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas shin tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kha dog tha dad pa /
translated: with nets of small bells, with many hundreds of thousands of banners and flags of various colors,

original: tshon tha dad pa /
analyzed: tshon tha dad pa /
translated: with various dyes,

original: shin tu mtho ba /
analyzed: shin tu mtho ba /
translated: very tall,

original: rin po ches rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po ches rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa /
translated: the jewels are adorned in various ways;

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa /
translated: the tips of the victory banners are beautified with crescents;

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btsugs pa /
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor btsugs pa /
translated: the center of the sun of gold from the Jambū River is erected;

original: 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba /
analyzed: 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba /
translated: various kinds of light rays emerge;

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis sa thams cad kun tu yog pa /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis sa thams cad kun tu yog pa /
translated: the ornaments of the victory banners cover the entire earth;🔽the ornaments of the victory banners are adorned with various kinds of light;🔽such banners are erected.

original: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam pa du ma 'od dang ldan pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrengs pa'i rgyan de lta bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun
analyzed: rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam pa du ma 'od dang ldan pas rab tu brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrengs pa'i rgyan de lta bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan gyis kun
translated: The ornaments of the victory banners are the ornaments of the victory banners that pervade all world systems with the ripening of karma.

original: tu khyab par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa /
analyzed: tu khyab par bya ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis klas pa /
translated: They are located in all world systems, throughout the realm of phenomena,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'byams klas pa la gnas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'byams klas pa la gnas pa /
translated: in all buddha realms, throughout the realm of space.

original: yangs pa / kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bar mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos pa'i khyab par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams la 'bul ba'am /
analyzed: yangs pa / kun tu rgyal mtshan gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bar mos pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa dang mos pa'i khyab par rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams la 'bul ba'am /
translated: Imagine that you offer the victory banner, which is vast and extends everywhere, to the blessed buddhas in order to fill all the world systems and to purify the bodhisattvas’ intentions and aspirations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten nam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten nam /
translated: Imagine that you offer the victory banner to the blessed buddhas who are present, or to the stūpas of the tathāgatas who have passed into parinirvāṇa,

original: @254a *// chos dkon mchog mchod pa'am /🔽dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul lam /
analyzed: @254a *// chos dkon mchog mchod pa'am / dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul lam /
translated: or to the jewel of the Dharma,🔽or to the jewel of the Saṅgha,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam /
translated: or to the spiritual friends who are bodhisattvas,

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sam /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams sam /
translated: or to the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: 'khor gyi tshogs su gyur pa'am /
analyzed: 'khor gyi tshogs su gyur pa'am /
translated: or to the assembly of followers,

original: gang zag gi rnam pa gzhan su yang rung ste /
analyzed: gang zag gi rnam pa gzhan su yang rung ste /
translated: or to any other kind of person.

original: slong ba thams cad la rim gror bya ba'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba na rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: slong ba thams cad la rim gror bya ba'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba na rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sbyin pas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When they give and bestow gifts in order to serve all beggars, they dedicate the wholesome roots gathered by giving flags and banners in this way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la thub pa med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams thams cad yang dag par sgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can du gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la thub pa med pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams thams cad yang dag par sgreng ba'i rgyal mtshan can du gyur cig /
translated: ‘Through this wholesome root, may all sentient beings be invincible with the banner and flag of wisdom, and may they raise the banner of all wholesome roots and merits.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi go 'phang bris pa sbed pa'i chos nyid kyis chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rgyal mtshan sgreng bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi go 'phang bris pa sbed pa'i chos nyid kyis chos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i rgyal mtshan sgreng bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings raise the banner of sovereignty over all phenomena by the Dharma of concealing the written Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te rin po che'i gzhi la sangs rgyas kyi chos bris pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du gyur te rin po che'i gzhi la sangs rgyas kyi chos bris pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with the Dharma of upholding the enlightened qualities of all the buddhas, and may they be endowed with the written teachings of the Buddha on the precious ground.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la mar me snang bar gyur te rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la mar me snang bar gyur te rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be like a lofty victory banner, illuminating all beings with the light of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan can du gyur cig /🔽sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i @254b chos can du gyur te ye shes dang / stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu sgreng bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan can du gyur cig / sems can thams cad bdud thams cad kyis mi thub pa'i @254b chos can du gyur te ye shes dang / stobs kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu sgreng bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with the victory banner of invincibility, in order to conquer all the demons.🔽May all sentient beings be endowed with the banner of wisdom and strength, and may they be invincible to all the demons.

original: sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad mi ltung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te ye shes mthu bo che'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rgyal mtshan thams cad mi ltung ba'i snang ba can du gyur te ye shes mthu bo che'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with the banner of the great power of wisdom, and may they be endowed with the banner of the Dharma that does not fall into any extreme.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag par gyur te ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings possess the victory banner of the sun-like mandala of wisdom, which radiates light rays, and may the mandala of wisdom purify the entire realm of phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la brtson zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu bsgrengs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa la brtson zhing rgyal mtshan sna tshogs rab tu bsgrengs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing brjod du med pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings possess the adornment of the victory banner of jewels, and may they be diligent in making offerings to the buddhas, and by raising various victory banners, may they fill the inexpressibly vast realms of all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyis dben zhing sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi rgyal mtshan gyis dben zhing sems 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur te sangs rgyas kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings possess the victory banner of the Buddha, and may they be free from the sixty-nine snares and have minds free from attachment.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / zab mo thams cad dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: In this way, when the bodhisattva mahāsattva makes gifts of banners and flags, he dedicates those roots of virtue so that all sentient beings may have the vast and extensive bodhisattva conduct and all the profound qualities.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing /🔽tha dad pa yang dag par @255a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba dang / 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan zhing / tha dad pa yang dag par @255a *//
translated: He dedicates so that they may have the banner of the conduct, miracles, and manifestations of all bodhisattvas.

original: shes pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: shes pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates so that they may attain the pure, perfect knowledge of the different.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang / sems can thams cad nor gyis phyug par byed pa dang / rin po che'i mdzod thams cad 'byed pa dang / rin po che thams cad gtong ba dang /🔽rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa dang / rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad phangs par mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che thams cad gtong ba la mos pa dang / sems can thams cad nor gyis phyug par byed pa dang / rin po che'i mdzod thams cad 'byed pa dang / rin po che thams cad gtong ba dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed pa dang / rin po che kun gyis sems can thams cad la khyab par byed pa dang / rin po che'i tshogs thams cad phangs par mi sems pa'i yid kyis gtong ba dang /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Sarva­ratna­dāna was devoted to giving away all jewels, to enriching all beings, to opening all the treasure troves of jewels, to giving away all jewels,🔽to giving away all the sources of jewels, to giving away all precious jewels, to pervading all beings with jewels, to giving away all the collections of jewels without any sense of loss,

original: rin po che'i tshogs thams cad 'thor ba'am /
analyzed: rin po che'i tshogs thams cad 'thor ba'am /
translated: to scattering all the collections of jewels,

original: rin po che thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems bskyed pa'i tshe srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la rin po che byin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad yongs su gtang bar sems bskyed pa'i tshe srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la rin po che byin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When they give rise to the intention to give away all jewels, they give jewels to countless trillions of beings. They dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way:

original: sems can thams cad dran pa'i rgyud rmongs pa med cing sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dran pa'i rgyud rmongs pa med cing sangs rgyas mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: ‘May all sentient beings be free from confusion and attain the vision of the Buddha.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pas /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi mdzod 'dzin pas /
translated: May all sentient beings hold the treasury of the Dharma of all the buddhas.

original: chos dkon mchog gi snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: chos dkon mchog gi snang ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the light of the jewel of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba shin tu brtan pas dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba shin tu brtan pas dge 'dun dkon mchog yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings hold the jewel of the Saṅgha by means of their stable generosity and giving.

original: sems can @255b thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can @255b thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems rin po che rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the precious mind of omniscience through the pure, irreversible mind of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa med par gzhol bas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rmongs pa med par gzhol bas ye shes rin po che la zhugs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings enter into the precious wisdom of the buddhas, by being dedicated to the non-deluded state of all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che tshad med pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che grangs med pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che tshad med pa yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rin po che grangs med pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with the precious qualities of the bodhisattvas, in order to demonstrate the immeasurable precious wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la brtson pas yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes rin po che mngon par 'tshang rgya ba la brtson pas yon tan rin po che mtha' yas pa'i bsngags pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be praised for their infinite precious qualities, by striving to attain the precious wisdom of the ten powers of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che shin tu yangs pa'i mthar thug pas ye shes rin po che bcu drug gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che shin tu yangs pa'i mthar thug pas ye shes rin po che bcu drug gi snyoms par 'jug pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the sixteen meditative absorptions of the precious jewel of timeless awareness, which is the ultimate vastness of the precious jewel of timeless awareness.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che la rnam par sangs rgyas pas rin po che'i dam pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rin po che la rnam par sangs rgyas pas rin po che'i dam pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become the supreme objects of veneration through the precious jewel of timeless awareness of the tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin po che rab tu ston pa la brtson pas rin po che'i dbang po dam par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i mdzod kyi chos rin po che rab tu ston pa la brtson pas rin po che'i dbang po dam par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become the supreme jewel lords, striving to reveal the precious Dharma of the inexhaustible treasury of the knowledge of distinctions.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rnam par dag cing nyams pa @256a *//
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che de dag yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi spyan rin po che rnam par dag cing nyams pa @256a *//
translated: When bodhisattva great beings give away and offer such precious jewels, they dedicate the goodness so that all sentient beings will have pure eyes, and that they will see the precious jewels of the buddhas.

original: med pas ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: med pas ye shes dam pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the precious, sublime wisdom may be perfected.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rgyan sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad rgyan sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: “Moreover, when great bodhisattva beings, their bodies and all their major and minor body parts adorned with various ornaments,

original: lus blta na sdug pa /
analyzed: lus blta na sdug pa /
translated: are endowed with a pleasing physical appearance,

original: rnam par dag cing mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: rnam par dag cing mi mthun pa med pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with pure, harmonious ornaments,

original: rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with all the precious substances,

original: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: adorned with many quintillions of different kinds of precious ornaments,

original: sems can thams cad kyi lus rgyan gyis brgyan par brtson pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lus rgyan gyis brgyan par brtson pa /
translated: and strive to adorn the bodies of all sentient beings with ornaments,

original: sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad stob pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la bu'i 'du shes kyis 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bde ba thams cad stob pa /
translated: and when they, with the perception of all sentient beings as their children, provide all worldly and transcendent happiness,

original: dga' ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rab tu dga' bar byed pa de /
analyzed: dga' ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rab tu dga' bar byed pa de /
translated: and when they delight sentient beings with various kinds of joy,

original: rgyan sna tshogs rnam ba tha dad pa dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tsho rgyan yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: rgyan sna tshogs rnam ba tha dad pa dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tsho rgyan yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate those roots of virtue in this way:

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du red par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyan rnam par dag pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du red par gyur cig /
translated: ‘May all sentient beings be adorned with the ornaments of wisdom and be the ornaments of the world with its gods.

original: sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi rgyud kyi mtshan rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings have the pure marks of the continuity of merit.

original: mtshan gyi lus shin tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: mtshan gyi lus shin tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May they have bodies adorned with the marks.

original: sems can thams cad bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan @256b dang ldan pa'i lus can du red de lus mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan @256b dang ldan pa'i lus can du red de lus mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have bodies endowed with the marks of a hundred merits and be adorned with bodies marked with the auspicious signs.’

original: sems can thams cad lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad lus kyi yan lag mtshan kun gyis brgyan pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings have bodies adorned with all the major and minor marks of a buddha.

original: lus mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: lus mtshan gyis shin tu rnam par bris pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
translated: May they have the perfect body, fully ornamented with the marks.

original: sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings have inexhaustible treasuries of different kinds of perfect knowledge

original: tshig gi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: tshig gi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: and be fully adorned with the ornaments of speech.🔽May all sentient beings have voices that are pleasant and pure,

original: sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag yid du 'ong zhing rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dbyangs kyi yan lag yid du 'ong zhing rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing yon tan gyis brgyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: and be adorned with the qualities of speech.🔽May all sentient beings have pleasant and beautiful speech, adorned with all the qualities of the buddhas,

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig gi tshul rnam par dag pas 'gro ba kun mgu bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong bar brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshig gi tshul rnam par dag pas 'gro ba kun mgu bar byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshig yid du 'ong bar brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: and may they please all beings with the pure way of the buddhas’ words.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kun la lta bas snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi rgyan gyis brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be absorbed in the view of all buddhas and be adorned with the ornament of mind.

original: sems can thams cad chos snang ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu thob cing gzungs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos snang ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu thob cing gzungs thams cad kyi rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the qualities of buddhahood through all the lights of the Dharma and be adorned with the ornament of all dhāraṇīs.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis rgyud shin tu brgyan pas sems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis rgyud shin tu brgyan pas sems ye shes kyis yang dag par brgyan pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have minds adorned with wisdom and be adorned with the continuum of the wisdom of the buddhas.”

analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi rgyan de dag yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams @257a *//
translated: When the bodhisattva mahāsattva gives those ornaments of the body, he dedicates the roots of virtue to all sentient beings so that

analyzed: cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang / ye shes kyi rgyan yongs su rdzogs te sems can thams cad kyi ris na nga rgyal dang / rgyags pa dang / dregs pa med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate all of these to the perfection of the adornments of all the immeasurable qualities of the Buddha, so that all beings will be free of pride, conceit, and arrogance.

analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang phyug la spyi po nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba /

original: cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che'i spyin ba byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / mngon par stob pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang / ltos pa med par yongs su gtong pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /
analyzed: cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che'i spyin ba byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / mngon par stob pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa dang / ltos pa med par yongs su gtong pa'i sems rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang /
translated: gives away and offers the crown jewels, and he increases the mind of giving without regard for all beings.

original: sbyin pas bsgos pa'i rgyud yongs su sgom pa dang / sbyin pa la dbang sgyur bar rab tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu slob pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i dbang po yongs su skyed pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i blo rgya cher byed pa'i tshe cod pan dang /🔽gtsug gi rin po che yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: sbyin pas bsgos pa'i rgyud yongs su sgom pa dang / sbyin pa la dbang sgyur bar rab tu 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa'i ye shes la rab tu slob pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i dbang po yongs su skyed pa dang / sbyin pa gtong ba'i blo rgya cher byed pa'i tshe cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate those roots of virtue in order to perfect the mindstream that is imbued with generosity, in order to engage in mastering generosity, in order to train in the wisdom of generosity, in order to develop the faculty of giving generosity, and in order to expand the mind of giving generosity.🔽When they give away their diadems and crowns,🔽they dedicate those roots of virtue in the following way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dbang po thams cad la shin tu dbang bskur bar gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dbang po thams cad la shin tu dbang bskur bar gyur cig /
translated: They dedicate those roots of virtue in this way: ‘Through these roots of virtue, may all sentient beings be crowned with the head ornament of omniscience and be crowned with the head ornament of the Buddha’s Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas spyi bo gtsug @257b tor can gyi mgo dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi gtsug gi pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas spyi bo gtsug @257b tor can gyi mgo dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the head ornament of the uṣṇīṣa and attain the perfection of wisdom.’

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar phyin pas ye shes rin po che mchog gis sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi yon tan gyi spyi bo'i mthar phyin pas ye shes rin po che mchog gis sems can thams cad yang dag par sdud par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be perfectly gathered by the supreme jewel of wisdom, having reached the pinnacle of the good qualities of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing ye shes rin po che'i mchog la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi spyi bos phyag bya bar 'os shing ye shes rin po che'i mchog la yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be worthy of the highest homage of all beings and may they be perfectly established in the supreme jewel of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi skyid pa la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu thob ste ye shes kyi cod pa na shin tu bcings par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi skyid pa la dbang bsgyur ba rab tu thob ste ye shes kyi cod pa na shin tu bcings par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain mastery over the happiness of the Dharma and may they be bound with the diadem of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis blta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te ye shes kyi nor bu rin po ches mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyis blta bar mi nus pa'i chos can du gyur te ye shes kyi nor bu rin po ches mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be adorned with the jewel of wisdom, having the quality of being unobservable by the entire world.

original: sems can thams cad spyi bor gyur pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par lta pa'i chos can du gyur te spyi bo shin tu btsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad spyi bor gyur pa'i ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la rnam par lta pa'i chos can du gyur te spyi bo shin tu btsun pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the most exalted head, the head of pristine awareness that looks upon all the qualities of buddhahood.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i snying po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing stobs bcu'i rgyan cod pan gyis mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes rin po che'i rgya mtsho'i snying po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing stobs bcu'i rgyan cod pan gyis mgo rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the head ornament of the ten powers, the pure essence of the ocean of the jewel of pristine awareness.

original: sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang po nas bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i khams kyi dang po nas bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i phyir sa'i dam pa la gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be on the highest level, in order to conquer all demons from the very beginning in the realm of desire.

original: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i mthar thug ste chos kyi ye shes kyi spyi bo rnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i mthar thug ste chos kyi ye shes kyi spyi bo rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the pure head of the pristine awareness of the Dharma, having reached the ultimate of the ten powers.

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis @258a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbu zil gyis @258a *//

analyzed: mi non pa'i snang ba rab tu thob ste rgyal po'i mchog dam par gyur cig /

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung gnas rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi cod pan dang /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cod pan dang / gtsug gi rin po che yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thams cad kyis ye shes mchog gi 'byung gnas rnam par dag pa dang / ye shes kyi cod pan dang /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings give away their crown jewels and the jewels in their topknots, they dedicate the goodness so that all sentient beings will have the pure source of the highest wisdom,

analyzed: nor bu rin po che rab tu thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos btson rar bcug cing btson chas bcings pa'i sems can sdug bsngal ba /

analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi khyim gyis bskor ba /

translated: who are imprisoned, whose bodies are tightly bound,

analyzed: mi bde bas lus shin tu mnar ba /
translated: whose bodies are tortured with pain,

original: skyabs med par ltung ba /
analyzed: skyabs med par ltung ba /
translated: who have fallen without any protection,

original: bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa /
analyzed: bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa /
translated: who are tormented by hunger and thirst,

original: gos med pa /
analyzed: gos med pa /
translated: who are naked,

original: mun pas yog cing khebs pa; shin tu rke ba /
analyzed: mun pas yog cing khebs pa; shin tu rke ba /
translated: They are covered in darkness, and are very hungry.

original: brla lcags sgrog gis sgrogs pa de lta bu dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / rgyal po mig bzang gis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang ste byin nas btson ra de nas sems can de dag yongs su thar par byed do //
analyzed: brla lcags sgrog gis sgrogs pa de lta bu dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' snying rje can dang / rgyal po mig bzang gis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du bdag dang 'khor du bcas pa nor thams cad dang bcas par yongs su btang ste byin nas btson ra de nas sems can de dag yongs su thar par byed do //
translated: Their thighs are shackled in iron fetters. Having seen them, the bodhisattva, the compassionate one, like King Sunetra, gives up everything, himself and his retinue, along with all his wealth, and liberates those beings from prison.

original: des btson ra de nas sems @258b can de dag thar par byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad mngon par byin nas sman dang / sman pa dang / sngags kyi rnam pas lus nad med par byas te bde ba dang / yid dga' ba la rab tu bkod nas chos rin po che thos par byas te dga' ba'i gtam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las mi nyams par byed do //
analyzed: des btson ra de nas sems @258b can de dag thar par byas nas kyang nor gyi sbyin pa thams cad mngon par byin nas sman dang / sman pa dang / sngags kyi rnam pas lus nad med par byas te bde ba dang / yid dga' ba la rab tu bkod nas chos rin po che thos par byas te dga' ba'i gtam gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la bkod nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las mi nyams par byed do //
translated: And having liberated those beings from prison, he gives them all the wealth he has, and through medicine, doctors, and mantras, he makes their bodies free from disease, and establishes them in happiness and joy. Having made them hear the precious Dharma, he establishes them in the roots of virtue through delightful speech, and causes them not to fall away from the teachings of the Buddha.

original: de de ltar sems can btson ra nas bkye bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: de de ltar sems can btson ra nas bkye bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: “When they have thus freed beings from prison, they dedicate the roots of virtue in this way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sred pa'i bcings pa dang / zhags pa las shin tu grol bar gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sred pa'i bcings pa dang / zhags pa las shin tu grol bar gyur cig /
translated: ‘Through these roots of virtue, may all sentient beings be completely freed from the bonds and snares of craving.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin cing 'khor ba'i rgyud shin tu chad par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin cing 'khor ba'i rgyud shin tu chad par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings reach the other shore of the vision of wisdom and completely sever the continuum of saṃsāra.

original: sems can thams cad bag la nyal ba shin tu bcom ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bag la nyal ba shin tu bcom ste /
translated: May all sentient beings destroy their latent tendencies

original: kun nas 'khor ba dang rnam par bral bsam rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog rnam par bsal cing rab rib med pa'i ye shes yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: kun nas 'khor ba dang rnam par bral bsam rig pa'i mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog rnam par bsal cing rab rib med pa'i ye shes yang dag par mthong bar gyur cig /
translated: and be free from the cycle of existence. May they dispel the darkness of ignorance, the cataracts and blindness, and see with the wisdom of perfect vision.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun dgon par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thug par gyur te khams gsum pa'i bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun dgon par bya ba'i ye shes kyi mthar thug par gyur te khams gsum pa'i bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings reach the end of the wisdom that is to be cultivated by all beings and be free from all the bonds of the three realms.

original: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i sar ye shes bsgribs pa med pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad shin tu shigs par @259a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa med pa'i sar ye shes bsgribs pa med pa mthong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing nyon mongs pa'i bcings pa thams cad shin tu shigs par @259a *//
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of seeing unobstructed wisdom on the level of no affliction and may they completely destroy all the bonds of affliction.

original: gyur cig / sems can thams cad rlom sems kyi g-yo ba rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir g-yo ba med pa'i ye shes la yang dag par gzhol zhing /
analyzed: gyur cig / sems can thams cad rlom sems kyi g-yo ba rnam par rgyu ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir g-yo ba med pa'i ye shes la yang dag par gzhol zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings be intent on wisdom that is unmoving, in order to completely conquer all the movements of conceit,

original: g-yo ba dang rlom sems kyi bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /
analyzed: g-yo ba dang rlom sems kyi bcings pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig /
translated: and may they be free from all the bonds of movement and conceit.

original: sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad du chags pa med par gnas shing 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad rnam par spangs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad du chags pa med par gnas shing 'dod pa'i dri ma thams cad dang bral te 'dod pa'i bcings pa thams cad rnam par spangs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be free from all the stains of desire and may they be free from all the bonds of desire.

original: sems can thams cad bsam pa sangs rgyas thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu grol bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsam pa sangs rgyas thams cad la btang bas lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu grol bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the highest motivation, with intentions directed toward all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: All sentient beings are as limitless as the realm of space.

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag tu sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa dag tu sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be free from attachment, liberated, and unfettered throughout the whole expanse of reality and the reaches of space.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / theg pa chen po la dgod par bya ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba dang / theg pa chen po la dgod par bya ba'i phyir rnam par rgyu zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings move throughout all world systems, bringing all beings to full maturity, guiding them, and establishing them in the Great Vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod par gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'dod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the superknowledges of bodhisattvas and move throughout all world systems as they wish.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad btson ra dang / btson tsha nas bkye bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams @259b cad shin tu grol zhing /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad btson ra dang / btson tsha nas bkye bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams @259b cad shin tu grol zhing /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings, by liberating all sentient beings from prison and from slavery, take hold of the roots of virtue and liberate all sentient beings completely.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may abide in the wisdom ground of all the tathagatas.🔽In the same way, I dedicate so that any sentient beings who are being led to be killed,

original: 'di ltar yang sems can la la zhig srog dang dbral ba'i phyir gsad du khrid pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang sems can la la zhig srog dang dbral ba'i phyir gsad du khrid pa /

original: sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi bzad cing 'dar ba /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan gyis mi bzad cing 'dar ba /
translated: terrified by various kinds of suffering,

original: bcing ba lngas bcings pa /
analyzed: bcing ba lngas bcings pa /
translated: bound by five fetters,

original: skye bo brgya phrag stong gis kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu gling du gtogs pa sna tshogs nas bshal zhing dkri ba /
analyzed: skye bo brgya phrag stong gis kun nas bskor cing 'dzam bu gling du gtogs pa sna tshogs nas bshal zhing dkri ba /
translated: surrounded by hundreds of thousands of people, dragged and pulled from various places in Jambudvipa,

original: gnyen bshes kyi rgyud dang / mdza' bo'i rgyud thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa /
analyzed: gnyen bshes kyi rgyud dang / mdza' bo'i rgyud thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa /
