analyzed: nges pa'i tshig dga' bar byed cing rim gror byed pa /
translated: They are skilled in the ways of honoring and pleasing him with delightful service.

original: rgyan bzang po rab tu mang pos blta na yid du 'ong bar brgyan pas shin tu rnam par dag pa; rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rgyan bzang po rab tu mang pos blta na yid du 'ong bar brgyan pas shin tu rnam par dag pa; rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang ldan pa /
translated: They were accompanied by trillions of musical instruments.

original: byang chub sems dpa' las kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun par byung ba las shes shing byang chub @303b sems dpa'i dbang gi rjes su 'brang ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' las kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun par byung ba las shes shing byang chub @303b sems dpa'i dbang gi rjes su 'brang ba /
translated: They were the result of the bodhisattva’s roots of virtue and were in accord with the bodhisattva’s power.

original: sems dga' bar byed pa de lta bu g-yog 'khor dang / chung ma'i 'khor dang / rol mor bcas pa shin tu bshes pa /
analyzed: sems dga' bar byed pa de lta bu g-yog 'khor dang / chung ma'i 'khor dang / rol mor bcas pa shin tu bshes pa /
translated: They were the most intimate of companions, wives, and musicians.

original: de dag thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad nas 'byung ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad nas 'byung ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: When he gave them all away, he dedicated those roots of virtue with a mind that had arisen from all beings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba rab tu thob pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' ba rab tu thob pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicated them with a mind that had attained delight in the Buddha’s Dharma.

original: snying po blang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: snying po blang ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicated them with a mind that had taken up the essence.

original: ye shes rdo rje'i dbyings mi shigs pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje'i dbyings mi shigs pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with the indestructible mind of the realm of the vajra of pristine consciousness.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate by attaining the maṇḍala of the tathāgatas.

original: snying po len par byas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: snying po len par byas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate by taking the essence.

original: bla na med pa'i sems dang ldan pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sems dang ldan pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with the unsurpassed mind.

original: ye shes kyis khong du chud pa'i chos dang ldan pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyis khong du chud pa'i chos dang ldan pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate with the Dharma that is understood by pristine consciousness.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su red par byas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su red par byas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate by becoming the source of all roots of merit.🔽I dedicate without contradicting all the buddhas of the three times.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi 'gal bar byas te yongs su bsngo'o; ;de lta bu'i chos la rnam par spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang mi 'gal bar byas te yongs su bsngo'o; ;de lta bu'i chos la rnam par spyod cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi rgyud du byung ba /
translated: “The bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices in that way, who has been born into the family lineage that possesses the family of the tathāgatas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnam par dag pas rab tu skyes ba /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs rnam par dag pas rab tu skyes ba /
translated: who has been born from the pure buddha family,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du sems mngon par skyes pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam du sems mngon par skyes pa /
translated: they had given rise to the mind that is the path to omniscience;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / ye shes 'byams klas pa la zhugs @304a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i las dang / ye shes 'byams klas pa la zhugs @304a *//
translated: they had entered into the bodhisattvas’ activities and infinite wisdom;

original: pa; 'jig rten gyi dri ma thams cad rab tu spyod pa /
analyzed: pa; 'jig rten gyi dri ma thams cad rab tu spyod pa /
translated: they had eliminated all the defilements of the world;

original: sbyin pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: they had the mind of generosity;

original: yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa /
analyzed: yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis sbyin pa'i gnas su gyur pa /
translated: they were the objects of generosity with the mandala of great qualities;

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyi gnas dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur ba /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyi gnas dang 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur ba /
translated: they were the abodes of all worlds and the support of all beings;

original: sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la yang dag par zhugs pa /
translated: they had entered into the purification of all beings;🔽and they were dedicated to upholding all roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzung ba la yang dag par brtson pa de 'khor thams cad yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzung ba la yang dag par brtson pa de 'khor thams cad yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: “He dedicated those roots of virtue that he had accumulated by giving up his entire retinue in the following way:

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrog pa rab tu thob ste ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin mi 'phrog pa rab tu thob ste ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'khor gyis bskor bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bodhisattvas’ concentration that cannot be disturbed and be surrounded by retinues of immeasurable concentrations.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas mthong bas spro ba dang dga' ba rab tu thob ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan la mnyam par gzhog par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas mthong bas spro ba dang dga' ba rab tu thob ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyan la mnyam par gzhog par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be filled with joy at the sight of the Buddha and rest in the adornments of the buddhas’ concentrations.

original: sems can thams cad tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse zhing spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad tshad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse zhing spyod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings abide in the emanations of immeasurable concentrations and enjoy the bodhisattvas’ concentrations.

original: sems can thams cad sems la 'khrug pa med cing chos dang mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems la 'khrug pa med cing chos dang mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the concentration that is in harmony with the Dharma and be free of mental disturbance.

original: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zab @304b mo rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin zab @304b mo rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bodhisattva’s profound meditative absorption and gain mastery over all meditative absorptions.

original: sems can thams cad yang dag par bral ba'i yid rab tu thob ste ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yang dag par bral ba'i yid rab tu thob ste ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the mental state of complete freedom and be endowed with the retinue of meditative absorption.

original: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa shin tu thob ste ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs la mkhas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa shin tu thob ste ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs la mkhas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the signs of meditative absorption and become skilled in various meditative absorptions.

original: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad sgom pa la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par shes par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad sgom pa la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par shes par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings abide in the cultivation of all meditative absorptions and understand the distinctions between meditative absorptions.

original: sems can thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sems kyis mi gnyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par spyod cing chags pa med cing ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sems kyis mi gnyis pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par spyod cing chags pa med cing ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings always and continuously practice nondual meditative absorption, be free from attachment, and attain meditative absorption.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor thams cad yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gzhan gyis mi phyed cing rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor thams cad yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gzhan gyis mi phyed cing rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, by giving up his entire retinue, dedicates those roots of virtue to the purity of the retinue of all sentient beings, which is not to be divided by others, and to the attainment of the assembly of the retinue of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates to all sentient beings so that they may attain the completely pure generation of the mind of awakening and the complete perfection of the qualities of the Buddha.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates to all sentient beings so that they may realize the wisdom of omniscience and completely perfect the power of omniscience.

original: skal pa mnyam pa'i sems can @305a *//
analyzed: skal pa mnyam pa'i sems can @305a *//
translated: to sentient beings of equal fortune

original: dang 'grogs pa dang / mthun pa'i g-yog 'khor rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //🔽kha na ma tho ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu 'grub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dang 'grogs pa dang / mthun pa'i g-yog 'khor rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o // kha na ma tho ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu 'grub pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate [this virtue] to all sentient beings so that they may obtain a retinue of harmonious attendants.🔽I dedicate [this virtue] to all sentient beings so that they may accomplish the roots of virtue that are free from wrongdoing and so that they may perfect the merit of omniscience.

original: sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dag pa 'thob pa dang / g-yog nges pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi sku rnam par dag pa 'thob pa dang / g-yog nges pa dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate [this virtue] to all sentient beings so that they may obtain the pure body of a buddha and a retinue of those who are faithful.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod shin tu rigs pa la zhugs pas rab tu ston pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o; ;'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las rnam par 'das pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mdzod shin tu rigs pa la zhugs pas rab tu ston pa dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad 'thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o; ;'gro ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las rnam par 'das pa dang /
translated: They dedicate to all sentient beings so that they may attain the treasury of all the qualities of the Buddha, and so that they may be able to teach the Dharma well, having entered into the most excellent reasoning, and so that they may attain all the successive stages of the knowledge of distinctions.🔽They dedicate so that all sentient beings may perfect the roots of virtue that transcend the whole world,🔽and so that they may perfect the roots of virtue that are the friends of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad grogs su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o; ;rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad grogs su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o; ;rnam par dag pa'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate to all sentient beings so that they may perfect all pure qualities, and so that they may perfect irreproachable actions.

original: chos snang ba thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la @305b yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos snang ba thams cad kyi rgyan yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la @305b yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate it to all sentient beings so that they may purify the adornments of all the appearances of phenomena and so that they may actualize all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: “Moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva should give away his sons, daughters, and wife.🔽Just as Prince Suśikṣita, King Sarvālaṅkārarāśi, and other bodhisattva mahāsattvas who are established on the path to omniscience gave away and relinquished everything,

original: ji ltar gzhon nu shin tu sbyang ba dang / rgyal po rgyan thams cad ston pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la mngon par gnas pa gtong ba dang / yongs su gtong ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
analyzed: ji ltar gzhon nu shin tu sbyang ba dang / rgyal po rgyan thams cad ston pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la mngon par gnas pa gtong ba dang / yongs su gtong ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa /
translated: increasing all giving and relinquishing,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i lam rnam par sbyong ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i lam rnam par sbyong ba /
translated: purifying the path of the bodhisattva’s giving,

original: phyis 'gyod pa med par gtong ba'i sems rnam par sbyong ba /
analyzed: phyis 'gyod pa med par gtong ba'i sems rnam par sbyong ba /
translated: and giving without any subsequent regret,

original: gtong ba rin po che thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa la mnyam par bzhag pa /🔽'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu sgrub pa /
analyzed: gtong ba rin po che thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa la mnyam par bzhag pa / 'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rab tu sgrub pa /
translated: He was absorbed in the thought of generating the mind of omniscience with all precious gifts.🔽He had accomplished the superior intention that purifies all beings.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa'i byang chub rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas dag pa'i byang chub rnam pa thams cad du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: He had perfected the superior intention of complete enlightenment in every way.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis bdag mngon par bskyab par yang dag par lta ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis bdag mngon par bskyab par yang dag par lta ba /
translated: He had the correct view of self-protection through the bodhisattva path.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu sems mngon du gyur par byin gyis rlob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub tu sems mngon du gyur par byin gyis rlob pa /
translated: He had the blessing of the manifest mind of enlightenment of all buddhas.🔽He had the transformation of the generation of the mind that abides in the family of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la gnas pa'i sems bskyed pa yongs su sgyur ba rnams kyis bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su btang ba de ltar bu dang bu mo dang chung ma de dag bsam pa stobs dang ldan par byas te btang
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la gnas pa'i sems bskyed pa yongs su sgyur ba rnams kyis bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su btang ba de ltar bu dang bu mo dang chung ma de dag bsam pa stobs dang ldan par byas te btang
translated: He gave away his sons, daughters, and wife, and in that way he gave them, having made their intentions powerful.

original: ba dang / bdag de bzhin nyid du mos par byas te sbyin par byed pa dang / bdag @306a *//
analyzed: ba dang / bdag de bzhin nyid du mos par byas te sbyin par byed pa dang / bdag @306a *//
translated: and giving with the conviction that the self is suchness;

original: nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyis ci 'dod par spyad par yang dag par lta ba dang / bdag sems can thams cad la sbyin pa kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur par byin gyis rlob pa dang / gang gis sems can dma' bar gyur pa de dag gis yongs su rgyas par byed pa dang /
analyzed: nyid 'jig rten thams cad kyis ci 'dod par spyad par yang dag par lta ba dang / bdag sems can thams cad la sbyin pa kun gyi 'byung gnas su gyur par byin gyis rlob pa dang / gang gis sems can dma' bar gyur pa de dag gis yongs su rgyas par byed pa dang /
translated: and seeing oneself as an object of enjoyment for the whole world; and blessing oneself as the source of all gifts for all beings; and being the one who is fully developed by those beings who are lowly;

original: de lta bu'i tshul gyis bdag yang dag par 'dzin pa dang mchod rten dam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyis bdag yang dag par 'dzin pa dang mchod rten dam par 'gyur ro //
translated: and being the one who is taken up by such a method and becomes the supreme object of worship.

original: zhes 'gro ba thams cad bdag spro bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems nyid 'gro ba thams cad la shin tu sgrub pa dang / bdag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i mu stegs su lta ba dang / bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'babs bde bar rab tu rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: zhes 'gro ba thams cad bdag spro bar byed pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems nyid 'gro ba thams cad la shin tu sgrub pa dang / bdag 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i mu stegs su lta ba dang / bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'babs bde bar rab tu rtogs pa dang /
translated: Thus, one should delight all beings, and one should fully accomplish the mind of omniscience for all beings, and one should view oneself as the ford of benefit for all beings, and one should fully realize oneself as the blissful descent for the whole world.

original: bdag 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin bdag tu mos par byed pa dang / bdag ye shes kyi yid dang ldan par byas shing bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson par yang dag par shes pa dang / bdag ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa la sbyor ba dang /
analyzed: bdag 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin bdag tu mos par byed pa dang / bdag ye shes kyi yid dang ldan par byas shing bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson par yang dag par shes pa dang / bdag ji ltar smras pa de ltar byed pa la sbyor ba dang /
translated: They are to be dedicated to being the benefactor of all beings, to be endowed with the wisdom mind, to be fully aware of being engaged in the bodhisattva conduct, to be engaged in doing what they say,🔽to be fully aware of being armored in the knowledge of omniscience, to seek the field of wisdom and merit, to protect the promise to all beings, to be fully engaged in practice,

original: bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i go cha bgos par rab tu rtog cing ye shes dang bsod nams kyi zhing tshol ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la dam bcas pa'i sems rjes su srung ba dang / rab tu nan tan byed pa la bdag shin tu gzhog pa dang /
analyzed: bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i go cha bgos par rab tu rtog cing ye shes dang bsod nams kyi zhing tshol ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad la dam bcas pa'i sems rjes su srung ba dang / rab tu nan tan byed pa la bdag shin tu gzhog pa dang /
translated: and to be fully dedicated.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du snang ba'i ye shes yang dag par skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi @306b gtong ba'i sems yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du dmigs par byed pa'i tshe chags pa med pa dang /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du snang ba'i ye shes yang dag par skyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi @306b gtong ba'i sems yid la byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du dmigs par byed pa'i tshe chags pa med pa dang /
translated: They are unattached to the perception of all the thus-gone ones.

original: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems dang ldan na /
analyzed: grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i sems dang ldan na /
translated: They have a mind that is free and unfettered.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes dang bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du ye shes dang bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: For the sake of all beings, they gather the accumulations of merit and wisdom. They dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way:

original: bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par bskor bas sangs
analyzed: bu dang bu mo dang chung ma yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pa yang dag par bskor bas sangs
translated: ‘Through the roots of virtue gathered by giving away my children, daughters, and wives, may all beings turn the irreversible wheel of the Dharma that fills all worlds with the Dharma.

original: rgyas kyi byang chub la 'jog par byed cing bdag gi lus kyi sprul pa rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig /
analyzed: rgyas kyi byang chub la 'jog par byed cing bdag gi lus kyi sprul pa rab tu 'gyed par gyur cig /
translated: may I send forth emanations of my body to establish them in the enlightenment of buddhahood.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du smon lam gyis 'dong zhing lus la mngon par chags pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du smon lam gyis 'dong zhing lus la mngon par chags pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings go by aspiration to all the buddhafields, without attachment to their bodies.

original: sems can thams cad kyi chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs shing sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs shing sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'i sems dang bral bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings abandon attachment and aversion, and be free from the attitude of liking and disliking.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su red par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rjes su spyod cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su red par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings follow the lineage of the Buddhas and be recognized as the children of the Tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i sems kyis byung zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu 'du shes thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad tha dad pa med pa'i sems kyis byung zhing sangs rgyas thams cad la rab tu 'du shes thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the attitude of non-differentiation and attain the recognition of all Buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku las byung ba gsung las @307a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku las byung ba gsung las @307a *//
translated: May all sentient beings come forth from the Dharma Body of all the Buddhas, and be born from the speech of the Tathagatas.

original: skyes par gyur te nges par sangs rgyas kyi sras su gyur cig /
analyzed: skyes par gyur te nges par sangs rgyas kyi sras su gyur cig /
translated: May they be born as the definite sons of the Buddha.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir go skabs rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur ba'i phyir go skabs rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the opportunity to realize the wisdom of the tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad yang dag par bral ba'i mthar phyin te sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yang dag par bral ba'i mthar phyin te sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings reach the ultimate separation from samsara and attain the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos gtong ba la brtson zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'god pa dang ldan par gyur te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos gtong ba la brtson zhing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yang dag par 'god pa dang ldan par gyur te /
translated: May all sentient beings be diligent in giving the unsurpassed Dharma and be endowed with the ability to establish others in the enlightenment of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad rkyen thams cad kyis zad par mi nus shing shin tu rtogs par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rkyen thams cad kyis zad par mi nus shing shin tu rtogs par gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have minds that are well-established and cannot be exhausted by any conditions.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du rnam par mchog thams cad dang ldan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par sangs rgyas te chos las skyes pa dang / chos las byung ba'i bu dang / bu mo dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du rnam par mchog thams cad dang ldan pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par sangs rgyas te chos las skyes pa dang / chos las byung ba'i bu dang / bu mo dang /
translated: May all sentient beings be fully enlightened, having attained the highest perfection, under the tree of awakening, and may they have sons and daughters and wives who are born from the Dharma and who are born from the Dharma.

original: chung ma rab tu 'phro bar byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: chung ma rab tu 'phro bar byed par gyur cig /
translated: May they be radiant.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu 'thob pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bu dang / bu mo dang / chung ma yongs su btang ba las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu 'thob pa dang / khams gsum pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva mahāsattva dedicates the wholesome roots that arise from giving away sons, daughters, and wives, in order to attain unobstructed wisdom and to realize liberation that is free from attachment to the entire three realms.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems @307b dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim gyi dngos po la chags par gnas pa'i rnam pa la mos pa med pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems @307b dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim gyi dngos po la chags par gnas pa'i rnam pa la mos pa med pa /
translated: “In this way, bodhisattva great beings do not have any interest in remaining attached to the things of the household.

original: khyim gyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su rtog pa med pa /🔽khyim gyi yo byad thams cad yongs su gnyer ba med pa /
analyzed: khyim gyi rnam par rtog pas yongs su rtog pa med pa / khyim gyi yo byad thams cad yongs su gnyer ba med pa /
translated: They do not conceptualize in terms of the household.🔽They do not pursue any of the household’s possessions.

original: khyim gyi chags pa thams cad kyi 'dod par gyur pa med pa /
analyzed: khyim gyi chags pa thams cad kyi 'dod par gyur pa med pa /
translated: They do not desire any of the household’s attachments.

original: khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad la ro myong bar lta ba med pa /🔽khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad la ro myong bar lta ba med pa / khyim gyi longs spyod thams cad khong du chud pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They do not view any of the household’s enjoyments as having any taste.🔽They have a mind that understands all the household’s enjoyments.

original: khyim la mngon par chags pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: khyim la mngon par chags pa thams cad las gyen du 'phags pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They have a mind that is elevated above all attachment to the household.

original: khyim dang gnas la brten pa thams cad la mngon bar mos pa med par gyur pa /
analyzed: khyim dang gnas la brten pa thams cad la mngon bar mos pa med par gyur pa /
translated: They have no interest in any of the household’s supports and abodes.

original: khyim dang gnas la brten pa thams cad yud tsam gyi 'du shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa /
analyzed: khyim dang gnas la brten pa thams cad yud tsam gyi 'du shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa /
translated: They bless all the household’s supports and abodes with the perception that they are momentary.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la shin tu 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa; byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la shin tu 'byung ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa; byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the intention to be of benefit to the teachings of the Buddha. They had the intention to enter all the stages of the bodhisattvas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the intention to be adorned with all the qualities of the Buddha.

original: gcig nas gcig tu rjes su 'gyod pa med par gtong ba /
analyzed: gcig nas gcig tu rjes su 'gyod pa med par gtong ba /
translated: They gave without regret.

original: dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa /
analyzed: dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi sgo nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa /
translated: They were praised by all the buddhas for all their objects of observation.

original: 'gyod pa med par gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa; khyim yongs su bzung ba shin tu gtang ba la mngon par chags pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: 'gyod pa med par gtong ba'i sems dang ldan pa; khyim yongs su bzung ba shin tu gtang ba la mngon par chags pa med pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
translated: They gave without regret. They had minds that were not attached to the relinquishment of the clinging to the household.

original: phyogs dang yul thams cad la gnas pa med par gnas pa /🔽khyim dang gnas @308a *//
analyzed: phyogs dang yul thams cad la gnas pa med par gnas pa / khyim dang gnas @308a *//
translated: They dwelled without dwelling in all directions and places.

original: la chags pas brtson pa med pa /
analyzed: la chags pas brtson pa med pa /
translated: They were not diligent in clinging to the household and dwelling.

original: yongs su bzung ba thams cad sbyin par shin tu btang bas gtong ba /
analyzed: yongs su bzung ba thams cad sbyin par shin tu btang bas gtong ba /
translated: They gave by relinquishing all that they had.

original: slong ba thams cad mthong na rab tu dga' ba dang / spyo ba dang / yid dga' ba skye bas slong ba rnams la tshul dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyim nas khyim gyi yo byad dang rgyan thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe khyim gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
analyzed: slong ba thams cad mthong na rab tu dga' ba dang / spyo ba dang / yid dga' ba skye bas slong ba rnams la tshul dang ldan pa'i sems kyis khyim nas khyim gyi yo byad dang rgyan thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe khyim gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
translated: When they see beggars, they are delighted and, with a respectful attitude, they give them everything they own, including their homes and all their jewelry.

original: yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When they give away their homes, they dedicate the resulting roots of virtue in the following way:

original: sems can thams cad dkon mchog dam par 'byung ba la mngon par mos shing bu dang bu mo shin tu btang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dkon mchog dam par 'byung ba la mngon par mos shing bu dang bu mo shin tu btang bar gyur cig /
translated: ‘May all sentient beings aspire to become the most precious of jewels. May they give up their sons and daughters.

original: sems can thams cad khyim med par rab tu byung zhing khyim las rnam par grol te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad khyim med par rab tu byung zhing khyim las rnam par grol te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings go forth from the household life, free from the household life, and practice pure conduct in the teachings of the perfectly awakened Buddha.’

original: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyis 'jungs pa med par gnas shing thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mngon par mos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyis 'jungs pa med par gnas shing thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mngon par mos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be generous, with a mind that is irreversible, and may they aspire to give everything away.

original: sems can thams cad gsog pa med cing chog shes pa la brtson pas khyim gyi chos dang rab tu bral bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gsog pa med cing chog shes pa la brtson pas khyim gyi chos dang rab tu bral bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be free from the phenomena of the household, and may they strive to be content and not accumulate things.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi pho brang dang gnas la yang dag par gnas shing khyim dang gnas la gnas pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi pho brang dang gnas la yang dag par gnas shing khyim dang gnas la gnas pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings live in the palaces of the buddhas and not in houses.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'i nan tan thams @308b cad 'gags par gyur te sgrib pa'i chos thams cad shin tu spangs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bar du gcod pa'i nan tan thams @308b cad 'gags par gyur te sgrib pa'i chos thams cad shin tu spangs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings stop all the practices that are obstacles and may they completely abandon all phenomena that are obscurations.

original: sems can thams cad gos pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas la brten pas ljan ljin med pa'i khyim dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gos pa med pa'i sems kyi gnas la brten pas ljan ljin med pa'i khyim dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have a home that is free of filth, based on a state of mind that is unstained.

original: sems can thams cad khyim na gnas pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa mthong ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas par gyur cig /🔽sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gnas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems kyi ye shes dang ldan zhing khyim gyi gnas rnam par rig pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig /

translated: May all sentient beings have the wisdom that sees all beings as fully enlightened, and may they become skilled in bringing them to full maturity.🔽May all sentient beings have the wisdom of the mind that has gone to the abode of all the Buddhas, and may they see the abode of the house as a perception that is fully known.

original: sems can thams cad khyim gyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par gcod pa rab tu thob cing sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa sim par byed par gyur cig /

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim gyi sbyin pa yongs su btang bas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / smon lam dang / rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bza' shing gi rab dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / longs spyod mang po sna tshogs kyi gnas yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa dang / stob pa dang / bdag sems can thams cad kyi bza' shing gi ra bar gyur pa'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pas phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems kyis gnas pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rtse ba dang longs spyod dang dga' ba la mos par gyur
translated: May all sentient beings delight in, enjoy, and strive for the bodhisattva’s play, enjoyment, and delight, because they are abiding in the bodhisattva liberation, with a mind that is never discouraged by bodhisattva conduct until the end of time.

original: mir gyur te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid stong gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bde ba'i rnam pas bskal pa sa mtshams med cing tshad med par dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / longs spyod thob par gyur pas ni /
analyzed: mir gyur te 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid stong gsum gyi mthar thug pa'i bde ba'i rnam pas bskal pa sa mtshams med cing tshad med par dga' ba dang / rtse ba dang / longs spyod thob par gyur pas ni /

analyzed: dge rgyas kyi lha'i bde ba la bskal pa mtshungs pa med par bde ba'i rnam pa zad mi shes pa dang 'grogs pas ma yin no //🔽gtsang ma'i gnas na gnas pas bskal pa mu med par bde ba dang 'grogs par gyur pas ma yin te /
translated: not by the bliss of the gods of Naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatana,🔽not by the bliss of the gods of the first concentration,🔽not by the bliss of the gods of the second concentration,🔽not by the bliss of the gods of the third concentration,🔽not by the bliss of the gods of the fourth concentration,🔽not by the bliss of the gods of the sphere of infinite space,🔽not by the bliss of the gods of the sphere of infinite

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba sna tshogs mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slong ba sna tshogs mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva mahāsattva sees various beggars, he becomes joyful.

original: spro ba skye'o //
analyzed: spro ba skye'o //
translated: He becomes inspired.

original: mos pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mos pa 'byung ngo //
translated: He becomes devoted.

original: rab tu dga' ba 'grub bo //
analyzed: rab tu dga' ba 'grub bo //
translated: He becomes very happy.

original: dad pa 'phel lo //
analyzed: dad pa 'phel lo //
translated: He increases his faith.

original: bsam pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: bsam pa 'byung ngo //
translated: He becomes intent.

original: dbang po las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: His faculties become serviceable.

original: dga' ba'i sems yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: His mind becomes completely joyful.

original: mos pa chen pos bskyed pa'i sems kyi shugs rnam par 'phel lo //
analyzed: mos pa chen pos bskyed pa'i sems kyi shugs rnam par 'phel lo //
translated: The power of his mind, which is generated by great devotion, increases.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rtsa ba brtan zhing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rtsa ba brtan zhing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The root of the enlightenment of the buddhas becomes firm and increases.

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag slong ba de dag dang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag slong ba de dag dang sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates those wholesome roots to those beggars and to all beings for the sake of benefit.

original: bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them for the sake of happiness.

original: don gyi @316b phyir yongs su bsngo'o //🔽rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: don gyi @316b phyir yongs su bsngo'o // rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them for the sake of the goal.🔽He dedicates them for the sake of purification.

original: byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them for the sake of enlightenment.

original: mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may be equal.

original: yid bzang po'i 'byung gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: yid bzang po'i 'byung gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may be the source of good thoughts.

original: theg pa chen po'i bzang pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i bzang pa nyid kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may be the good of the Great Vehicle.

original: brtsams pa bzang po thams cad shes pa dang / 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: brtsams pa bzang po thams cad shes pa dang / 'byor bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may know and attain all good beginnings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas stobs bcu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas stobs bcu'i ye shes mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may fulfill the conduct and vows of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra and attain the ten powers of knowledge.

original: de yang sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i lus kyi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de yang sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i lus kyi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the physical actions of a bodhisattva, free and unattached.

original: sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i ngag gi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i ngag gi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the verbal actions of a bodhisattva, free and unattached.

original: sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i yid kyi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems chags pa med pa dang / grol zhing bcings pa med pa'i yid kyi las kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates so that beings may have minds that are free from attachment, liberated, and unfettered.🔽He dedicates so that beings may not be dedicated to the notion of a sentient being,

original: de yang sems can gyi 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ma yin; gzhung de bzhin du srog gi 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: de yang sems can gyi 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ma yin; gzhung de bzhin du srog gi 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of a life-force,

original: gang zag gi 'du shes kyis ma yin /🔽shed las skyes pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: gang zag gi 'du shes kyis ma yin / shed las skyes pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of a person,🔽not to the notion of a human,

original: shed bdag gi 'du shes kyis ma yin; skye ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: shed bdag gi 'du shes kyis ma yin; skye ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of a human being,🔽not to the notion of a descendant of Manu,

original: byed pa po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin no //
analyzed: byed pa po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin no //
translated: not to the notion of a creator,

original: tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: tshor ba po'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of a knower,

original: yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ma @317a *//
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i 'du shes kyis yongs su bsngo ba ma @317a *//
translated: not to the notion of an existent or nonexistent,

original: yin; 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: yin; 'jig rten 'di'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of this world,

original: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol gyi 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of the next world,

original: shi 'pho ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: shi 'pho ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of death,

original: skye ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: skye ba'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of birth,

original: rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not to the notion of permanence,

original: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /
translated: not through the perception of impermanence,

original: sred pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /🔽sred pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin /🔽'du shes med pas yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
analyzed: sred pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin / sred pa med pa'i 'du shes kyis ma yin / 'du shes med pas yongs su bsngo ba ma yin /
translated: not through the perception of craving,🔽not through the perception of the absence of craving,🔽not through the perception of nonexistence,

original: 'du shes med pa ma yin pas yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te /🔽de la chags pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa ma yin pas yongs su bsngo ba ma yin te / de la chags pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: not through the perception of existence,🔽but through the mind that is free from attachment that one dedicates.

original: bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bcings pa med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Through the mind that is free from bondage that one dedicates.

original: grol ba med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: grol ba med pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: Through the mind that is free from liberation that one dedicates.

original: de ni / las yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: de ni / las yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: One does not dedicate karma.

original: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //🔽rtog pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //🔽rnam par rtog pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa yongs su mi bsngo'o // rtog pa yongs su mi bsngo'o // rnam par rtog pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: One does not dedicate ripening.🔽One does not dedicate thoughts.🔽One does not dedicate concepts.

original: sems pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //🔽bsam pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //🔽sems yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems pa yongs su mi bsngo'o // bsam pa yongs su mi bsngo'o // sems yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: One does not dedicate intention.🔽One does not dedicate aspiration.🔽One does not dedicate mind.

original: sems med pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems med pa yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: One does not dedicate the absence of mind.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe nang la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe nang la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: When one dedicates in this way, one is not attached to the inner.

original: phyi rol la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rkyen la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: phyi rol la mngon par chags pa med do // rkyen la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to external things.🔽He is not attached to conditions.

original: dmigs pa la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽rgyu la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: dmigs pa la mngon par chags pa med do // rgyu la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to objects.🔽He is not attached to causes.

original: rgyu 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽chos la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: rgyu 'dus pa la mngon par chags pa med do // chos la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the aggregation of causes.🔽He is not attached to phenomena.

original: @317b chos nyid la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽sems pa la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: @317b chos nyid la mngon par chags pa med do // sems pa la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the nature of phenomena.🔽He is not attached to thoughts.

original: bsam pa la mngon par chags pa med do //
analyzed: bsam pa la mngon par chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to intentions.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe gzugs la mngon par chags pa med do //🔽gzugs nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe gzugs la mngon par chags pa med do // gzugs nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: When he dedicates in this way, he is not attached to form.🔽He is not attached to the appropriation of form.

original: gzugs 'gog pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs 'gog pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the cessation of form.

original: tshor ba la chags pa med do //🔽tshor ba nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la chags pa med do // tshor ba nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to feeling.🔽He is not attached to the appropriation of feeling.

original: tshor ba 'gog pa la chags pa med do //🔽'du shes la chags pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba 'gog pa la chags pa med do // 'du shes la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the cessation of feeling.🔽He is not attached to perception.

original: 'du shes nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the appropriation of perception.

original: 'du shes 'gog pa la chags pa med do; ;'du byed la chags pa med do //🔽'du byed nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes 'gog pa la chags pa med do; ;'du byed la chags pa med do // 'du byed nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to volitional factors.🔽He is not attached to the appropriation of volitional factors.

original: 'du byed 'gog pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed 'gog pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the cessation of volitional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do //🔽rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do // rnam par shes pa nye bar len pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to consciousness.🔽He is not attached to the appropriation of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa 'gog pa la chags pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'gog pa la chags pa med do //
translated: He is not attached to the cessation of consciousness.

original: gang de lta bu'i chos la chags pa med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang de lta bu'i chos la chags pa med pa de ni /
translated: He who is not attached to such dharmas

original: gzugs la bcings pa med do //🔽gzugs kyi skye ba la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs la bcings pa med do // gzugs kyi skye ba la bcings pa med do //
translated: is not bound by form.🔽He is not bound by the arising of form.

original: gzugs kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
translated: He is not bound by the cessation of form.

original: tshor ba la bcings pa med do //🔽tshor ba'i skye ba la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba la bcings pa med do // tshor ba'i skye ba la bcings pa med do //
translated: He is not bound by feeling.🔽He is not bound by the arising of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: tshor ba'i 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
translated: He is not bound by the cessation of feeling.

original: 'du shes la bcings pa med do //🔽'du shes kyi skye ba la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes la bcings pa med do // 'du shes kyi skye ba la bcings pa med do //
translated: He is not bound by perception.🔽He is not bound by the arising of perception.

original: 'du shes kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: 'du shes kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
translated: He is not bound by the cessation of perception.

original: 'du byed la bcings pa med do //🔽'du byed kyi @318a *//🔽skye ba la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed la bcings pa med do // 'du byed kyi @318a *// skye ba la bcings pa med do //
translated: There is no bondage in formations.🔽There is no bondage in the arising of formations.

original: 'du byed kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
translated: There is no bondage in the cessation of formations.

original: rnam par shes pa la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa la bcings pa med do //
translated: There is no bondage in consciousness.🔽There is no bondage in the arising of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la bcings pa med do; ;rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la bcings pa med do; ;rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la bcings pa med do //
translated: There is no bondage in the cessation of consciousness.

original: gang chos de dag la bcings pa med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang chos de dag la bcings pa med pa de ni /
translated: Those who are not bound to those phenomena

original: chos thams cad la chags pa med pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la chags pa med pa ste /
translated: are not attached to any phenomena.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽chos gang la 'dzin pa'am /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / chos gang la 'dzin pa'am /
translated: Why is that?🔽There are no phenomena that can be grasped,

original: chos gang la chos kyis chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu skyes pa'am /
analyzed: chos gang la chos kyis chags par 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu skyes pa'am /
translated: and there are no phenomena that can be attached to by phenomena.🔽There are no phenomena that have arisen,

original: skye ba'am / skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
analyzed: skye ba'am / skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do //
translated: that are arising, or that will arise.

original: de yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni; 'du shes dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar chos thams cad ni; 'du shes dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te /
translated: Moreover, all phenomena are essentially devoid of conceptualization and are by nature unreal.

original: gcig ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig ma yin no //
translated: They are not one.

original: gnyis ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis ma yin no //
translated: They are not two.

original: mang po ma yin no //
analyzed: mang po ma yin no //
translated: They are not many.

original: tshad med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad med pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not immeasurable.

original: chung du ma yin no; ;nyung du ma yin no //
analyzed: chung du ma yin no; ;nyung du ma yin no //
translated: It is not small. It is not few.

original: dma' ba ma yin no //🔽yangs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dma' ba ma yin no // yangs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not low.🔽It is not vast.

original: zab pa ma yin no //
analyzed: zab pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not profound.

original: gsal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not clear.

original: zhi ba ma yin no //
analyzed: zhi ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not peaceful.

original: spros pa ma yin no //🔽gnas ma yin no //
analyzed: spros pa ma yin no // gnas ma yin no //
translated: It is not elaborate.🔽It is not a basis.

original: gnas med pa ma yin no //🔽chos ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas med pa ma yin no // chos ma yin no //
translated: It is not a non-basis.🔽It is not a phenomenon.

original: chos med pa ma yin no //🔽bsgoms pa ma yin no //
analyzed: chos med pa ma yin no // bsgoms pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a non-phenomenon.🔽It is not meditation.

original: bsgoms pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgoms pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not non-meditation.

original: yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not existent.

original: med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not non-existent.

original: de de ltar chos med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams la rnam par lta ste /
analyzed: de de ltar chos med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams la rnam par lta ste /
translated: In that way, he views phenomena as a way of not having phenomena.

original: chos kyi tshig gi lam la gnas pas chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: chos kyi tshig gi lam la gnas pas chos ma yin zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: Dwelling in the path of the words of the Dharma, he does not see anything that can be called ‘not having phenomena.’

original: de las kyi @318b lam yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do //
analyzed: de las kyi @318b lam yang rgyun gcod par mi byed do //
translated: He does not cut off the path of karma.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam par thogs par mi byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yang rnam par thogs par mi byed do //
translated: He does not obstruct the bodhisattva conduct.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las kyang phyir mi ldog go /
translated: He does not turn back from omniscience.

original: rten pa'i las sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: rten pa'i las sgyu ma lta bur yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that the actions that are its basis are like illusions.

original: chos sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba yang 'jig par mi byed do //
analyzed: chos sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba yang 'jig par mi byed do //
translated: He does not destroy the Dharma, which is like an echo.

translated: adorned with various beautiful jeweled ornaments and various limb ornaments.

original: ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: ba'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bu dang bu mos gang ba byang chub kyi sems la gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par slong ba re la yang yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bu dang bu mos gang ba byang chub kyi sems la gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par slong ba re la yang yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
translated: May I give countless world systems filled with sons and daughters, who abide in the mind of awakening and give to each supplicant until the end of time.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi lus kyis yongs su bkang ste byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs shin tu bde ba'i yid kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /

translated: May I fill countless world systems with my own body and give them away with a mind of utmost happiness, through the power of the thought of awakening.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi mgos yongs su bkang ste bag yod pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi mgos yongs su bkang ste bag yod pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
translated: May I fill countless world systems with my own head and give them away with a mind of heedfulness.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi lus las byung ba'i mig gis yongs su bkang ste mig gi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa rang gi lus las byung ba'i mig gis yongs su bkang ste mig gi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
translated: May I fill countless world systems with eyes that come from my own body and give them away as the gift of eyes.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa sha dang rkang gis yongs su bkang ste sdug bsngal gyis nyams pa med pa'i yid kyi dbang pos yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /

translated: May I fill countless world systems with flesh and bones and give them away with a sense of mind that is not diminished by suffering.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdag dbang ba'i rgyal po'i srid dang skyid pas yongs su bkang ste srid kyi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bdag dbang ba'i rgyal po'i srid dang skyid pas yongs su bkang ste srid kyi sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
translated: May I fill countless world systems with the wealth of a king who is my own and give them away as the gift of wealth.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bran dang las byed pa'i mis yongs su bkang ste gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / ma 'dres par gtong ba chen po'i sems la gnas pas slong ba re re la yang yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa bran dang las byed pa'i mis yongs su bkang ste gtang ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / ma 'dres par gtong ba chen po'i sems la gnas pas slong ba re re la yang yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
translated: May I give to each and every beggar, abiding in a great, unadulterated state of mind.🔽And in the same way, may I take care of the entire realm of sentient beings, so that not a single sentient being is left out.

original: de bzhin du @327b sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yongs su bzung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad las gcig kyang ma chud pa med par slong ba gcig la ji lta bar slong ba thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sems can re re zhing
analyzed: de bzhin du @327b sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par yongs su bzung ste sems can gyi khams thams cad las gcig kyang ma chud pa med par slong ba gcig la ji lta bar slong ba thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sems can re re zhing
translated: Just as I would for one beggar, so also for all beggars, for each and every sentient being,

original: yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par tshim par byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par tshim par byed par gyur cig /
translated: may I satisfy them all for as long as it takes to reach the end of time.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: Just as in one world system, for as long as the future, he practices the bodhisattva deeds, so also in all world systems, as many as there are atomic particles in the entire expanse of the realm of phenomena,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du yang snying rje chen po yangs pa yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bas sems can thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe de'i rgyus bdag gi sems sbyin pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa thams cad du yang snying rje chen po yangs pa yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse bas sems can thams cad la rim gro byed pa'i tshe de'i rgyus bdag gi sems sbyin pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig /
translated: and in the whole realm of space, he fills his mind with the vastness of great compassion, and when he serves all sentient beings with a mind of love, may his mind never turn back from generosity.

original: gtong ba'i sems kyis se gol gtogs pa tsam yang skyo bar ma gyur cig /
analyzed: gtong ba'i sems kyis se gol gtogs pa tsam yang skyo bar ma gyur cig /
translated: May he never tire of giving, even for as long as it takes to snap one’s fingers.

original: de yang 'di ltar chags pa med pa'i sems dang / shin tu gtong ba'i sems dang / bdag nyid yangs pa'i sems dang / zab pa'i sems dang / legs par yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang / mngon par ma zhen pa'i sems dang / chos la srog med pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: de yang 'di ltar chags pa med pa'i sems dang / shin tu gtong ba'i sems dang / bdag nyid yangs pa'i sems dang / zab pa'i sems dang / legs par yongs su sdud pa'i sems dang / mngon par ma zhen pa'i sems dang / chos la srog med pa'i sems dang /
translated: It is a mind free of attachment, a mind of complete generosity, a mind of self-mastery, a mind of profundity, a mind of excellent gathering, a mind of non-attachment, a mind of the lifelessness of phenomena,

original: yid shin tu thul ba'i sems dang / ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / g-yeng ba med pa'i sems dang / @328a *//
analyzed: yid shin tu thul ba'i sems dang / ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang / g-yeng ba med pa'i sems dang / @328a *//
translated: a mind of well-tamed thought, a mind of non-disturbance, a mind of non-distraction,

original: rin po che'i rigs sna tshogs thob pa'i sems dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad la re ba med pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sems dang / bsngo ba chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang /
analyzed: rin po che'i rigs sna tshogs thob pa'i sems dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad la re ba med pa'i sems dang / chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i sems dang / bsngo ba chen po'i rjes su 'brang ba'i sems dang /
translated: a mind of attaining various precious types, a mind of not hoping for any ripening of karma, a mind of fully awakening to all phenomena without exception, a mind of following great dedication,🔽and a mind of not being satisfied with the accumulations of merit and wisdom.

original: don gyi chos shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang / ye shes chen po'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i sems dang / chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i sems dang /
analyzed: don gyi chos shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang / ye shes chen po'i sa rab tu thob pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod pa'i sems dang / chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i sems dang /
translated: the mind that realizes the true Dharma, the mind that attains the stage of great wisdom, the mind that establishes all sentient beings in omniscient wisdom, the mind that generates the great light of the Dharma,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sems kyis sbyin par gyur cig /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i sems kyis sbyin par gyur cig /

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems kyi skad cig re re la nye bar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste /🔽sems can de dag longs spyod kyis phongs pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: Thus, the bodhisattva mahāsattva dedicates those roots of virtue accumulated in each moment of mind,🔽in order to perfect and not lack enjoyments for those sentient beings.

original: de dag gi bsod nams mi zad pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de dag gi bsod nams mi zad pa yang dag par bsdu ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: de dag gis bde bar gtogs pa'i bde ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i las kyi tshogs kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: de dag gis chos thams cad kyi phung @328b po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad bsal zhing dgag pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba mi 'phrog pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis mi g-yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the perfection of the pure, unshakable meditative absorption.

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tha dad pa med pa la yongs su bsngo bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tha dad pa med pa la yongs su bsngo bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the dedication of the wisdom of omniscience, which is without distinction.

original: sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / rnam par 'phrul ba mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the perfection of the infinite bodhisattva activities and manifestations.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnas med pa yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnas med pa yang dag par sgrub pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the accomplishment of roots of virtue that are without abode.

original: sems can thams cad kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa rnam par dag pa bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the purification of the recollection of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa mngon par skyes pas rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa mngon par skyes pas rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the purification of the roots of virtue that have arisen.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bdud kyi las dang / sgrib pa dang / bar du gcod pa'i chos thams cad bsal zhing dgag pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the removal and prevention of all the activities of Māra, obscurations, and obstacles.

original: sems can thams cad kyi yon tan gyi spyod pa mtha' yas pa mngon par skyes pa mnyam zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su @330b bsngo'o; ;sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs rlabs po che yid la🔽bya ba dang mi 'bral bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: They dedicate so that all sentient beings may never be separated from the mental activity of the great waves of the minds of all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtson pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par bya ba la brtson pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate so that all sentient beings may never be separated from the mental activity of striving to please all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad kyis go skabs rnyed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba skyon med pa dang / chos dkar po thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: They dedicate so that all sentient beings may attain the perfection of the purity of the sameness of all the virtuous roots of all sentient beings, and of all the pure virtuous qualities.

original: sems can thams cad kyi shin tu rgya che zhing mtha' yas pa'i sems dang bsam pa rlabs po che mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par dag pa la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the purity of the sameness of the vast and limitless thoughts and intentions of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the purity of the sameness of the generous thoughts of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / nan tan mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang / nan tan mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par dag par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that all sentient beings may abide in the purity of the sameness of the moral discipline and practice of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad brtson 'grus chen po'i phung po brtson 'grus thams cad mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i rgyud 'tshob par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

original: sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rab tu thob par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rab tu thob par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

original: sems can thams cad bsam gtan mtha' yas @331a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsam gtan mtha' yas @331a *//
translated: All sentient beings are limitless concentrations.🔽

translated: I dedicate goodness so that all beings may have the wisdom and super-knowledge that comes from the infinite concentration of meditation.

original: sems can thams cad kyis chos kyi sku shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis chos kyi sku shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate goodness so that all beings may have the wisdom of the Dharma body, which is the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa rnam par dag cing mnyam pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate goodness so that all beings may have the infinite purity of the realm of reality, which is perfect equality.

original: sems can thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

original: sems can thams cad spyod pa mthun pas yang dag par 'byung zhing chos yang dag par sgrub pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

translated: They dedicate so that all sentient beings may be in harmony in their actions and may be completely fulfilled by the sameness of the correct practice of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la gnas te yongs su bsngo'o //

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus kyi las mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dag gi las mnyam zhing rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /
