analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi yon tan thams cad 'thob pa'i ye shes khong du chung pa rnam par dag pa 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa las 'byung bar yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: the pure knowledge that all sentient beings will attain all good qualities; the perfection of the equality of the dedication of all roots of virtue of all sentient beings to the vehicle of omniscience;

translated: the perfection of the equality of all sentient beings seeing, entering, and experiencing the pure realms; the perfection of the faultless equality of all sentient beings seeing all buddhas;

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang / bsod nams kyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad @332a *//
translated: to cause all sentient beings to attain the perfection of the sameness of all the various adornments of merit, the major and minor marks,

analyzed: yan lag drug cu dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyi rkyen phun sum tshogs pa'i gsung yan lag brgyad stong phrag brgyad kyis brgyan pa dang / gsung gi tshul mtha' yas pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yang dag par sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: to cause the perfection of the attainment of the Buddha’s voice, which is endowed with the eighty adornments of the voice endowed with the sixty branches, and which is endowed with the qualities of the infinite ways of the voice,

original: sems can thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i rgyan chags pa med pa'i sems kyis mnyam par 'grub par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mi 'phrog pa thams cad dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i rgyan chags pa med pa'i sems kyis mnyam par 'grub par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rgyan mi 'phrog pa thams cad dang / tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: to cause all sentient beings to attain the perfection of the sameness of the adornment of the ten powers, with an unattached mind, and to cause the perfection of the sameness of the adornment of the Buddha’s qualities, which is not taken away, and the perfect knowledge of the different kinds of discrimination,

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mi 'jigs pas khyu mchog dang / sengge'i nga ro mnyam pa nyid sgrog par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med cing phyir mi ldog pa rab tu bskor bas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba dang /

translated: It is to cause all sentient beings to proclaim the equality of the lion’s roar, which is the supreme fearlessness.🔽It is to cause all sentient beings to attain omniscient wisdom by turning the irreversible and unobstructed wheel of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad kyis chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las thams cad rnam par dag pas dus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las thams cad rnam par dag pas dus mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to cause all sentient beings to perfect the equality of engaging in the accomplishment of all phenomena. It is to cause all sentient beings to perfect the equality of all roots of virtue at the same time.

original: sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ded dpon yongs su grub cing rnam par dag pas @332b mnyam pa nyid du bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis rgyan gcig dang / rgyan mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ded dpon yongs su grub cing rnam par dag pas @332b mnyam pa nyid du bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis rgyan gcig dang / rgyan mtha' yas pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: to cause all sentient beings to have the same perfect and pure unsurpassed captain;🔽to cause all sentient beings to have the same perfect adornment, whether it be a single adornment or infinite adornments or the same adornments as all buddhas;🔽to cause all sentient beings to have the same perfect mind that follows the maṇḍala of the three times by means of the sameness of all times;

original: sems can thams cad kyis dus thams cad mnyam pas dus gsum gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su 'gro ba'i yid mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'dod zhing chos bstan pa don du gnyer ba'i skye mched mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /

translated: to cause all sentient beings to have the same perfect sense bases, desiring all buddha realms and pursuing the teaching of the Dharma;

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa la phan pa'i rim gro rtag tu byed par shes pa'i rjes su 'dod par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis chos thams cad rnam par mthong ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad mthong ba dang ldan pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /

translated: to be dedicated to the equality of all sentient beings seeing all phenomena with the wisdom that sees everything;🔽to be dedicated to the equality of the unimpeded ripening of all the paths of action of all sentient beings;

translated: to be dedicated to the equality of the knowledge of the faculties of all beings through the various superknowledges of all faculties of all sentient beings;

original: sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam @333.1a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rnam par dbye ba med pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam @333.1a *//
translated: to be dedicated to the equality of the wisdom of all sentient beings that is without differentiation;

analyzed: pa nyid gcig cing rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mi mthun pa med cing mthun pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rnam par phye ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul chen po can gyi rdzu 'phrul khong du chud pa rab tu 'thob pa'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi yon tan zad mi shes pa dang /
translated: the accomplishment of the sameness of the absence of discord and the concordance of all the roots of virtue of all sentient beings;🔽the accomplishment of the sameness of the attainment of the understanding of the miracles and great miracles of the bodhisattvas by all sentient beings;🔽the attainment of the sameness of the inexhaustible qualities of the buddhas and the merit of omniscience by all sentient beings;

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams gcig tu mnyam pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pa dang mi 'bral zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yongs su shes par bya ba dang /

translated: the understanding of the sameness of all phenomena by all sentient beings, without being separated from the generation of the mind of enlightenment;

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam par gyur te dam pa'i chos mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis mthu chen pos sbyin pa rnam par dag cing snying rje chen po mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob par bya ba dang /

translated: May all sentient beings become the most worthy recipients of generosity, and may they perfect their vision of the sublime Dharma.🔽May all sentient beings attain the equality of great compassion and the pure generosity of great power.🔽May all sentient beings perfect the equality of the splendor that is difficult to bear.

original: sems can thams cad kyi zil gyis ma non cing bzod par dka' ba'i gzi brjid mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi thub par dka' @333.1b zhing blta na don yod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi zil gyis ma non cing bzod par dka' ba'i gzi brjid mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi thub par dka' @333.1b zhing blta na don yod pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: May all sentient beings perfect the equality of the unerring view that is difficult to fathom.

original: sems can thams cad kyi pham pa med pa'i sems dang / yid dang bsam pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos 'byams klas pa thams cad la dogs pa med par zhugs te khong du chud par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi pham pa med pa'i sems dang / yid dang bsam pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi chos 'byams klas pa thams cad la dogs pa med par zhugs te khong du chud par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to perfect the undefeatable mind, thought, and intention of all sentient beings.🔽It is to be without doubt and to comprehend all the vast Dharma of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'od dang 'od zer gcig rab tu gtong ba mnyam pa nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa mthar phyin par bya ba mnyam pa nyid la nan tan byed par bya ba dang /

translated: It is to cause all sentient beings to enter into the sameness of the light and rays of a single light that is emitted into all world systems. It is to cause all sentient beings to practice the sameness of the bodhisattvas’ indefatigable, perfected diligence.

original: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa gcig pa dang / smon lam mthun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi brjod pa gcig dang / 'byung ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa gcig pa dang / smon lam mthun pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi brjod pa gcig dang / 'byung ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to perfect the single conduct of all sentient beings. It is to perfect the sameness of aspirations. It is to perfect the sameness of the expressions of all sentient beings. It is to perfect the sameness of the elements of all sentient beings. It is to perfect the sameness of the higher motivation of all bodhisattvas in all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong zhing mgu bar bya ba mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mthong zhing mgu bar bya ba mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / sems can thams cad gdul ba rgyun mi 'chad pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to attain the sameness of seeing and pleasing all spiritual friends in all sentient beings. It is to perfect the sameness of the uninterrupted bodhisattva conduct and training of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi thogs pa med par chos bstan pa dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad du grag pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa yongs su @333.2a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi thogs pa med par chos bstan pa dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad du grag pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa yongs su @333.2a *//
translated: the accomplishment of the sameness of the teaching of the Dharma to all sentient beings without impediment, the manifestation of all the aspects of speech,🔽the accomplishment of the sameness of the roots of virtue that dedicate all the minds and thoughts of all sentient beings to a single mind and thought,

original: rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang shes pa thams cad sems dang shes pa gcig tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rnam par bral ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod par bya ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
analyzed: rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang shes pa thams cad sems dang shes pa gcig tu yongs su bsngo ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rnam par bral ba med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par bsags pa mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu dgod par bya ba dang ldan pa'i ye shes rnam par dag par bya ba dang /
translated: and the purification of the wisdom that is endowed with the accomplishment of the sameness of the accumulation of all the roots of virtue that are not separated from all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams kyi lhun mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rmongs pa med par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsams shing yongs su bsngo ba shin tu grub par 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams kyi lhun mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rmongs pa med par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsams shing yongs su bsngo ba shin tu grub par 'gyur ba'i mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: the equality of the accumulation of merit for omniscience of all sentient beings being completely pure,🔽the equality of the accomplishment of the roots of virtue of all sentient beings being completely accomplished without confusion,🔽the equality of the complete accomplishment and perfection of the manifest enlightenment of all sentient beings in omniscience,

original: sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'byung ba thams cad mi mnyam pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang /

original: ye shes kyi 'byung ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor gcig rnam par dag pa 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig dang mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang ldan par bya ba dang /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'byung ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad 'khor gcig rnam par dag pa 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyis brgyan pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig dang mnyam pa nyid du mthong ba dang ldan par bya ba dang /
translated: the perfection of the sameness of all the elements of pristine consciousness,🔽the ornament of the sameness of pristine consciousness that purifies all retinues by purifying a single retinue,🔽the sameness of seeing the buddha realm of all sentient beings as a single buddha realm,

original: sems can thams cad kyi lhab lhub thams cad dang / lhab lhub brjod du med pa dang / lhab lhub mtha' yas pa dang / @333.2b lhab lhub mu med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan par bya ba'i lhab lhub mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /

original: sems can thams cad kyis chos thams cad rnam par rtogs shing mkhas pa dang / don dam par rtogs pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba /

translated: to cause all sentient beings to attain the perfection of the sameness of the superknowledges that are not different and are free from difference, and to attain the perfection of the sameness of merit and qualities,

original: sems can thams cad kyis chos mi mnyam pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba gcig tu legs par dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /

original: sems can thams cad tshur zil gyis gnon cing phar zil gyis mi non pa'i sems can thams cad kyi ye shes dang / lus rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying brtse ba dang ldan pa /

original: rmongs pa med pa /
analyzed: rmongs pa med pa /

analyzed: mchog tu bya ba / mi phyed pa /

analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa /

analyzed: sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa /

original: mdud pa med pa /
analyzed: mdud pa med pa /

analyzed: nyams pa med pa /

analyzed: chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa /

analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba la yang dag par brtson pa /

original: las ngan pa thams cad 'gag pa /
analyzed: las ngan pa thams cad 'gag pa /

original: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: dka' thub dang brtul zhugs chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa /

analyzed: brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyis sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu sbyong ba /

analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus kyis len pa /

analyzed: ye shes chen po'i mig gis yang dag par blta ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /

original: ye shes kyi 'byung gnas @334b dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu nyan pa /🔽sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba /🔽sems can thams cad yon tan rnam par dag pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par yongs su bsngo ba /

translated: They were the source of wisdom and the roots of virtue.🔽They dedicated the roots of virtue to all sentient beings.🔽They dedicated the roots of virtue equally in order to establish all sentient beings in pure qualities.

original: sems can thams cad kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdu ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsdu ba la mkhas pa /
translated: They were skilled in gathering the roots of virtue for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: don gyi rjes su song ba'i khams kyi yon tan mngon par shes ba; sems can thams cad dang mnyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par byang ba yongs su bsngo ba /

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing gi rnam pa la chos dkar po'i sa bon lta bur gyur pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing gi rnam pa la chos dkar po'i sa bon lta bur gyur pa /
translated: They are like the seeds of virtuous dharmas in the aspect of the field of merit of all sentient beings.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gyod pa med par yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'gyod pa med par yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa /
translated: They are the dedication of all roots of virtue without regret.

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i skal ba yongs su bsngo bas yongs su 'dzin pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i skal ba yongs su bsngo bas yongs su 'dzin pa /
translated: They are the dedication of the fortune of omniscience for the realm of all sentient beings.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi skal ba dang chos kyi char 'bebs pas dbyar gyi dus su gyur pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi skal ba dang chos kyi char 'bebs pas dbyar gyi dus su gyur pa /
translated: They are the time of summer, which rains down the fortune of all roots of virtue and the Dharma.

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i rigs dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i rigs dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: “The one who has the family of dedication dedicates those roots of virtue in the following way:

original: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde zhing skyid pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde zhing skyid pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: May all sentient beings be completely happy.

original: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can @335a *//
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can @335a *//
translated: May all sentient beings be completely liberated.🔽May all sentient beings be equal.🔽May all sentient beings be endowed with complete knowledge.🔽May all sentient beings be established in virtuous qualities.

original: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad chos dkar po la shin tu bkod par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad chos dkar po la shin tu bkod par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i mig dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with unimpaired eyes.

original: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu dul ba'i yid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i 'dul ba dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste; de ltar yongs su bsngo ba yang las kyi gnas su yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can thams cad shin tu dul ba'i yid dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i 'dul ba dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste; de ltar yongs su bsngo ba yang las kyi gnas su yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate in such a way that it is not dedicated to the realm of karma.

original: rnam par smin pa'i gnas su ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i gnas su ma yin no //
translated: It is not dedicated to the realm of ripening.

original: lus kyi gnas su ma yin no //
analyzed: lus kyi gnas su ma yin no //
translated: It is not dedicated to the realm of the body.

original: dngos po'i gnas su ma yin no //🔽zhing gi gnas su ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i gnas su ma yin no // zhing gi gnas su ma yin no //
translated: It is not dedicated to the realm of things.🔽It is not dedicated to the realm of fields.

original: phyogs kyi gnas su ma yin no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi gnas su ma yin no //
translated: It is not dedicated to the realm of directions.

original: sems can thams cad kyi gnas su yongs su mi bsngo'o //🔽sems can thams cad kyi gnas las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi gnas su yongs su mi bsngo'o // sems can thams cad kyi gnas las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: I do not dedicate to the realm of all sentient beings.🔽I do not dedicate to the realm of all sentient beings as something separate.

original: mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su mi bsngo ste /
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa thams cad las gud du 'phags par yang yongs su mi bsngo ste /
translated: I do not dedicate to the realm of all sentient beings as something exalted.

original: mngon par zhen pa'i chos yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa'i chos yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate in order to know the phenomena of all attachments.

original: de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing stob pa /
analyzed: de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo zhing stob pa /
translated: They dedicate and offer those roots of virtue to all sentient beings.

original: 'jig rten thams cad nges par byed pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad nges par byed pa //
translated: They are certain to be in all worlds.

original: @335b sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
analyzed: @335b sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
translated: They perfect the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: bsam pa mnyam pas sems las su rung bar byas pa /
analyzed: bsam pa mnyam pas sems las su rung bar byas pa /
translated: They make their minds workable through equal intentions.

original: shin tu dag pa /
analyzed: shin tu dag pa /
translated: They are very pure.

original: shin tu brtags pa /
analyzed: shin tu brtags pa /
translated: They are very discerning.

original: shes rab dang ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: They have wisdom and gnosis.

original: nang mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: nang mnyam par gzhag pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They are inwardly in equipoise.

original: phyi rol gyi dmigs pa shin tu rtogs pa /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dmigs pa shin tu rtogs pa /
translated: They have a very thorough understanding of external objects.

original: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i mthar phyin pa /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i mthar phyin pa /
translated: They have reached the end of the past, future, and present.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rigs shin tu gsal ba dang ldan pa de yongs su bsngo ba des de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe tshur zil gyis gnon la phar zil gyis mi gnon pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rigs shin tu gsal ba dang ldan pa de yongs su bsngo ba des de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe tshur zil gyis gnon la phar zil gyis mi gnon pa yin /
translated: They have the very clear lineage of the buddhas. When they dedicate in that way, they overpower those who are inferior to them, but they are not overpowered by those who are equal or superior to them.

original: yon tan mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: yon tan mi zad pa yin /
translated: They have inexhaustible qualities.

original: 'gro ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa la brtson pa yin /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa la brtson pa yin /
translated: they are dedicated to the practice of all bodhisattvas in all worlds;🔽they see all the buddhas who dwell in all realms in their own vision with little difficulty;

original: zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang tshegs chung dus mig lam du snang bar mthong ba yin; 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ba yin te /
analyzed: zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang tshegs chung dus mig lam du snang bar mthong ba yin; 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod par snang ba yin te /
translated: they appear to be practicing bodhisattva conduct in all world realms;

original: tshig rab tu phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu thob cing khong du chud do //
analyzed: tshig rab tu phye ba thams cad la mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyang rab tu thob cing khong du chud do //
translated: they have attained and comprehend the dhāraṇīs that are endowed with skill in all the divisions of words;🔽and they fulfill the complete satisfaction of all beings through the circle of the teaching of the Dharma that is uninterrupted until the end of the future time,

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i chos bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i don
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i chos bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sems can thams cad dga' bar bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i don
translated: and they purify an inexpressible number of inexpressibly described buddha realms.

original: du sems kyi skad cig re re la mig yor snang ba'i tshul du skye ba yin /
analyzed: du sems kyi skad cig re re la mig yor snang ba'i tshul du skye ba yin /
translated: In each instant of mind, they arise like the appearance of a mirage.

original: 'jig @336a *// rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes kyis🔽ngoms mi shes pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig @336a *// rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su rdzogs par byed kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes kyis ngoms mi shes pa yin /
translated: Even though they perfect in each instant of mind the pure buddha fields of the inexpressibly inexpressible world systems, they are never satisfied with the wisdom that analyzes the purification of the buddha fields.

original: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mnyam pa nyid gang la bdag nyid gnas pa de la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin /🔽yongs su sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa mnyam pa nyid gang la bdag nyid gnas pa de la yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin / yongs su sgrub pa yin /
translated: They perfect in that very state of equality the inexpressibly inexpressible hundreds of thousands of niyutas of koṭis of beings in whom they are established.🔽They accomplish it.

original: yongs su sbyong ba yin /
analyzed: yongs su sbyong ba yin /
translated: They purify it.

original: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la rab tu brtson par byed cing sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la rab tu brtson par byed cing sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa yin /
translated: They strive in all the perfections and gather beings.

original: las ji ltar rnam par dag pa'i tshul bzhin du'ang yang dag par 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: las ji ltar rnam par dag pa'i tshul bzhin du'ang yang dag par 'byung ba yin /
translated: It arises in accordance with the way in which karma is purified.

original: thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa'ang rab tu 'thob pa yin /
analyzed: thogs pa med pa'i rna ba mngon par sgrub pa'ang rab tu 'thob pa yin /
translated: They also attain the accomplishment of unobstructed ears.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te chos mtha' yas pa bstan cing brjod pa thos nas de dag thams cad 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te chos mtha' yas pa bstan cing brjod pa thos nas de dag thams cad 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: They hear the turning of the wheel of Dharma in inexpressibly inexpressible buddha realms, and they retain all of those infinite teachings that are taught and expressed.

original: chos bstan pa de la ring ba'i 'du shes nye bar mi gzhog go /
analyzed: chos bstan pa de la ring ba'i 'du shes nye bar mi gzhog go /
translated: They do not entertain the notion that those teachings are distant.

original: sems skad cig gis byung ba /
analyzed: sems skad cig gis byung ba /
translated: They are momentary.

original: dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas pa /
translated: They are based on the absence of things.

original: rten pa med cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la gnas shing /
analyzed: rten pa med cing mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gnas pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul la gnas shing /
translated: They are based on the bodhisattvas’ superknowledge, which is without support, without formation, and without location.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing @336b brjod du med par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po rnam par phye ba thams cad du 'gro bar bya ba la se gol gtogs pa tsam yang dus gang du'ang thogs pa med pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing @336b brjod du med par 'gro ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po rnam par phye ba thams cad du 'gro bar bya ba la se gol gtogs pa tsam yang dus gang du'ang thogs pa med pa yin /
translated: They can go to inexpressibly many buddha realms and can go to all the different buddha realms in the time it takes to snap one’s fingers.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe yang skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe yang skal pa mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: They will see bodhisattvas who are their equals when they are practicing bodhisattva conduct.

original: yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang rnam par dag cing /
analyzed: yon tan 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang rnam par dag cing /
translated: They will attain these and other qualities,

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mthun pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i yon tan dang / legs pa 'thob par 'gyur na /
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mthun pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang / zad mi shes pa'i yon tan dang / legs pa 'thob par 'gyur na /
translated: which are pure, have no center or edge, are the maṇḍala that accords with bodhisattva conduct, are beyond description and beyond being beyond description, and are inexhaustible qualities and excellence.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe 'di lta ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe 'di lta ste /
translated: When they attain manifestly perfect buddhahood in unsurpassed, genuinely perfect enlightenment, they will attain the following qualities.

original: zhing thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lus thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbang po thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /🔽las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
analyzed: zhing thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / lus thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / dbang po thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba thams cad rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang /
translated: the purity of all realms, the purity of all beings, the purity of all bodies, the purity of all faculties,🔽the purity of all ripening of karma, the purity of all assemblies, the purity of all perfected conduct,

original: chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs @337a *//
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs @337a *//
translated: the purity of engaging in the way of all phenomena, the purity of the fulfillment of the aspirations of all tathāgatas,

original: par bya ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa lta ci smos /
analyzed: par bya ba rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob pa lta ci smos /
translated: How much more so for the purity of sameness of the purification of the field of activity of all buddhas, and for the attainment of the purity of sameness of the manifestation of the field of activity of all buddhas!

original: bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu gcig pa /
translated: Chapter 41

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe yon tan gyi rgyud kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang / yon tan thams cad rab tu brgyan par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob ste /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe yon tan gyi rgyud kyi tshul rnam par dag par bya ba dang / yon tan thams cad rab tu brgyan par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu 'thob ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva mahāsattva dedicates in this way, he attains the perfection of the method of the stream of qualities and the adornment of all qualities.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe sems can rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽zhing rnams sems can dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe sems can rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do // zhing rnams sems can dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: When he dedicates in this way, he does not contradict the fields of sentient beings.🔽He does not contradict the fields of sentient beings.

original: zhing rnams sems can gyi las dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: zhing rnams sems can gyi las dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the fields of the karma of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi las rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽bsam pa sems dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can gyi las rnams zhing dang 'gal bar mi byed do // bsam pa sems dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the karma of sentient beings.🔽He does not contradict the mind.

original: sems bsam pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽bsam pa dang sems dmigs pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems bsam pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do // bsam pa dang sems dmigs pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the mind.🔽He does not contradict the object of the mind.

original: dmigs pa bsam pa dang sems dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: dmigs pa bsam pa dang sems dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the object of the mind.🔽He does not contradict the ripening of karma.

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa rten pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do; ;rten pa las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽las bya ba lam dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa rten pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do; ;rten pa las kyi rnam par smin pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do // las bya ba lam dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the path of action.

original: lam las bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽chos nyid @337b mtshan nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: lam las bya ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do // chos nyid @337b mtshan nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the path of action.🔽He does not contradict the characteristics of reality.

original: mtshan nyid chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽chos rnams skye ba'i rang bzhin dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: mtshan nyid chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do // chos rnams skye ba'i rang bzhin dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the characteristics of reality.🔽He does not contradict the nature of the arising of phenomena.

original: skye ba'i rang bzhin chos rnams dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: skye ba'i rang bzhin chos rnams dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the nature of the arising of phenomena.

original: zhing gi mnyam pa nyid sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: zhing gi mnyam pa nyid sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of the field with the sameness of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid zhing gi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid zhing gi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of sentient beings with the sameness of the field.

original: sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can gyi mnyam pa nyid chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of sentient beings with the sameness of phenomena.

original: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of all phenomena with the sameness of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of all sentient beings with the sameness of all phenomena.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyi gnas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyi gnas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of the end of desire with the sameness of the abode of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi gnas mnyam pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi gnas mnyam pa nyid 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of the abode of all sentient beings with the sameness of the end of desire.

original: 'das pa ma 'ongs pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: 'das pa ma 'ongs pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the past with the future.

original: ma 'ongs pa 'das pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang ltar byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa 'das pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do // ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang ltar byung ba dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the future with the past.🔽He does not contradict the future with the past and the present.

original: da ltar byung ba ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba ma 'ongs pa dang 'das pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the present with the future and the past.

original: dus mnyam pa nyid sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //🔽sangs rgyas mnyam @338a *//
analyzed: dus mnyam pa nyid sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do // sangs rgyas mnyam @338a *//
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of the times with the sameness of the buddhas.

original: pa nyid dus mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: pa nyid dus mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the sameness of the buddhas with the sameness of the times.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict the bodhisattva conduct with omniscience.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not contradict omniscience with the bodhisattva conduct.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe las mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe las mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: “When he dedicates in that way, he is endowed with the sameness of actions.

original: rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin; lus mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin; lus mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the sameness of ripening. He is endowed with the sameness of body.

original: tshul mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: tshul mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is endowed with the sameness of conduct.

original: smon lam mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: smon lam mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the sameness of aspirations.🔽They are endowed with the sameness of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin; zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin; zhing thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the sameness of all realms.

original: spyod pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: spyod pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the sameness of all conduct.

original: ye shes thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the sameness of all wisdom.

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They are endowed with the sameness of all buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par mnyes par byed pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon par mnyes par byed pa yin /
translated: They delight all the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa yin /
translated: They delight all bodhisattvas.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: They accomplish all roots of virtue.

original: smon lam thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: smon lam thams cad mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: They accomplish all aspirations.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: They accomplish the ripening of all beings.

original: las thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: las thams cad rab tu rtogs pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the realization of all actions.

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong @338b zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong @338b zhing bsnyen bkur byed pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: It is the accomplishment of seeing and serving spiritual friends.

original: rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the circle of all purity.

original: chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the entrance into the way of all phenomena.

original: chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: chos dkar po thams cad yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'grub par byed pa yin te /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the circle of the purity of the dedication of all good actions.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: “O sons of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'gro ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the bodhisattvas’ great dedication, called ‘Following the Equality of All Beings.’

original: bdun pa'o // yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: bdun pa'o // yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: The bodhisattva great beings who possess this dedication

original: 'dod pa thams cad kyi tsher ma dang bral zhing phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa yin /
analyzed: 'dod pa thams cad kyi tsher ma dang bral zhing phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa yin /
translated: They are free from the thorns of all desires and have conquered their adversaries.

original: rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas ltos pa med par shin tu byung ba yin /
analyzed: rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pas ltos pa med par shin tu byung ba yin /
translated: They have no dependence, for they have become one with the continuity of the Dharma.

original: yon tan gyi rgyal srid dang dbang rab tu thob pas bsod nams kyis skyob pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: yon tan gyi rgyal srid dang dbang rab tu thob pas bsod nams kyis skyob pa'i mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have great power, for they are protected by their merit and have attained the kingdom of the qualities and the power of the Dharma.

original: zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la zhugs pas chags pa med par spyod pa yin /
analyzed: zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la zhugs pas chags pa med par spyod pa yin /
translated: They are free from attachment, for they have entered the path that leads to all the buddhafields.

original: lus thams cad dang ldan pas shin tu rnam par phye ba yin /
analyzed: lus thams cad dang ldan pas shin tu rnam par phye ba yin /
translated: They are very open, for they have all the qualities of a buddha.

original: spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas spyod pa chen pos byung ba yin /🔽sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rna ba'i shes pa thogs pa med par zhugs pas chos thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i ye shes dang ldan pas spyod pa chen pos byung ba yin / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rna ba'i shes pa thogs pa med par zhugs pas chos thams cad yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have great conduct, for they have the wisdom that manifests all conduct and aspirations.🔽They have the knowledge of all phenomena, for they have unimpeded hearing in all buddhafields.

original: shes rab kyi mig shin tu @339a *//
analyzed: shes rab kyi mig shin tu @339a *//
translated: They have the eye of wisdom, for they have the eye of the Dharma.

original: dag pa'i blo rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: dag pa'i blo rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang ldan pa yin /
translated: They have attained the pure mind, and so they see all the buddhas.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad ba yin te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par bya ba la rgyun mi 'chad ba yin te /
translated: They are uninterrupted in bringing to completion all the roots of virtue they have begun.

original: chos 'thob par bya ba thams cad thob pas rlom sems med pa yin no //
analyzed: chos 'thob par bya ba thams cad thob pas rlom sems med pa yin no //
translated: They have attained all the teachings to be attained, and so they are free of conceit.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
translated: Then the great bodhisattva Vajra­dhvaja, through the blessing of the Buddha, looked into the ten directions

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: and at that time spoke these verses:🔽“They dedicate to the infinite

original: de dag bsod nams rlabs chen byed pa dang // rgya che zab mo phra dang rags byed cing //
analyzed: de dag bsod nams rlabs chen byed pa dang // rgya che zab mo phra dang rags byed cing //
translated: all the vast, profound, subtle, and coarse merit they have created,

original: sna tshogs chung ngu'i rnam pa byed kyang rung //🔽thams cad mtha' yas rnam par yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: sna tshogs chung ngu'i rnam pa byed kyang rung // thams cad mtha' yas rnam par yongs su bsngo //
translated: and also the various small aspects of it.

original: de dag dngos po ji snyed gang yod pa //
analyzed: de dag dngos po ji snyed gang yod pa //
translated: Whatever things they have,

original: rgya che yangs pa gang dang gang yang rung //
analyzed: rgya che yangs pa gang dang gang yang rung //
translated: whether vast or small,

original: glang po'i shing rta rta yi shing rta dang // gos dang dbyig dang gser dang dngul dag gis //
analyzed: glang po'i shing rta rta yi shing rta dang // gos dang dbyig dang gser dang dngul dag gis //
translated: with clothes, jewels, gold, and silver,

original: phyogs dang zhing rnams mtha' yas kun bkang zhing //
analyzed: phyogs dang zhing rnams mtha' yas kun bkang zhing //
translated: they fill all the infinite directions and realms.🔽With their heads, eyes, hands,🔽flesh, legs, and likewise feet,

original: de dag mgo dang mig dang lag pa dang // sha dang rkang dang de bzhin rkang pa dang // rang gi lus kyis kun bkang sbyin par bsngo //
analyzed: de dag mgo dang mig dang lag pa dang // sha dang rkang dang de bzhin rkang pa dang // rang gi lus kyis kun bkang sbyin par bsngo //
translated: they dedicate the filling of all with their own bodies.

original: de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo byas nas //
analyzed: de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo byas nas //
translated: Having made such dedications,

original: sems can phan phyir yongs su dgrol sems kyis //
analyzed: sems can phan phyir yongs su dgrol sems kyis //
translated: with a mind to liberate for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: mtha' dang dbus med bskal par spyod pa byed //
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med bskal par spyod pa byed //
translated: they engage in conduct for endless eons.

original: 'gro ba kun nas de dag sems mi ldog /
analyzed: 'gro ba kun nas de dag sems mi ldog /
translated: Their minds do not turn back from all realms.

original: de dag 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i phyir //
translated: For the benefit of all realms,

original: legs par byas pa'i las kyis srid gsum gyi //
analyzed: legs par byas pa'i las kyis srid gsum gyi //
translated: by the power of their virtuous karma,

original: 'gro @339b pa ma lus thams cad ci nas kyang //
analyzed: 'gro @339b pa ma lus thams cad ci nas kyang //
translated: they dedicate so that all beings in the three existences

original: bde bar 'gyur zhing byang chub thob par bsngo //
analyzed: bde bar 'gyur zhing byang chub thob par bsngo //
translated: without exception will attain happiness and enlightenment.

original: de dag mnyam zhing mtshungs par yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: de dag mnyam zhing mtshungs par yongs su bsngo //
translated: They dedicate equally and similarly.

original: las rnams dag pa ji ltar yongs bsgrubs pa; ;de dag 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par bsngo //
analyzed: las rnams dag pa ji ltar yongs bsgrubs pa; ;de dag 'gro ba kun dang mnyam par bsngo //
translated: They dedicate all their actions to the benefit of all beings.

original: de dag smon lam 'ching bar 'gyur ba med //🔽'gro ba kun tu ci la'ang thogs med par //
analyzed: de dag smon lam 'ching bar 'gyur ba med // 'gro ba kun tu ci la'ang thogs med par //
translated: They do not bind themselves with vows,🔽But in all worlds they are unimpeded.

original: thams cad rjes su smon lam de dag 'gro //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su smon lam de dag 'gro //
translated: They dedicate all their vows to the benefit of all beings.

original: de dag 'gro la phan phyir bsngo byed kyang //
analyzed: de dag 'gro la phan phyir bsngo byed kyang //
translated: They dedicate to the benefit of all beings,

original: mkhas pa rnams la spros pa gang yang med //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams la spros pa gang yang med //
translated: But the wise have no conceptualization.

original: 'gro ba kun la de dag gnyis gyur cing //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la de dag gnyis gyur cing //
translated: They are the refuge of all beings,

original: sbyin pas 'phags te tshul khrims rnam dag la //
analyzed: sbyin pas 'phags te tshul khrims rnam dag la //
translated: And they are superior through generosity and pure morality.

original: brtson 'grus stobs kyis sems la bcings med pa //
analyzed: brtson 'grus stobs kyis sems la bcings med pa //
translated: They are not bound by the power of diligence,

original: de dag smon lam phyir ldog med pa yin //
analyzed: de dag smon lam phyir ldog med pa yin //
translated: And their vows are irreversible.

original: de dag bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin pa dag /
analyzed: de dag bsngo ba'i pha rol phyin pa dag /
translated: They are dedicated to the perfection of dedication,

original: chos kyi rgyud la blo gros gnyis mnyam pa //🔽de dag don nges pha rol phyin bya'i phyir //
analyzed: chos kyi rgyud la blo gros gnyis mnyam pa // de dag don nges pha rol phyin bya'i phyir //
translated: And their minds are equal to the continuity of the Dharma.🔽They go to the Jina, the Lord of humans,

original: rkang gnyis dbang po'i drung du ye shes rkang pas 'dong //
analyzed: rkang gnyis dbang po'i drung du ye shes rkang pas 'dong //
translated: With the feet of wisdom for the sake of the perfection of the meaning.

original: de dag chos kyi rnga yi mthar phyin pas //
analyzed: de dag chos kyi rnga yi mthar phyin pas //
translated: They have perfected the drum of the Dharma.

original: rtag tu ye shes rnam pa'i snying po 'chang //
analyzed: rtag tu ye shes rnam pa'i snying po 'chang //
translated: They always have the essence of the aspect of wisdom.

original: tshul bzhin chos la chags pa med par zhugs //
analyzed: tshul bzhin chos la chags pa med par zhugs //
translated: They are correctly engaged in the Dharma without attachment.

original: de bas de dag yid la chags pa med //🔽chos la gnyis su byed pa med pa ste //
analyzed: de bas de dag yid la chags pa med // chos la gnyis su byed pa med pa ste //
translated: Therefore, they have no attachment in their minds.🔽They do not make the Dharma into two.

original: gnyis su med par chos la mi byed do //
analyzed: gnyis su med par chos la mi byed do //
translated: They do not make the Dharma into nonduality.

original: gnyis med gnyis las yongs su grol bas na //
analyzed: gnyis med gnyis las yongs su grol bas na //
translated: They are free from duality and nonduality.

original: 'gro ba kun gyi tshig lam thams cad shes //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi tshig lam thams cad shes //
translated: They know all the paths of speech of all beings.
